eng: a role where a state is able to take some risks and enable the economy to grow.
zul: indima lapho umbuso ukwazi ukwenza izinto ezingaba wusizo olukhulu nakuba zinobungozi nobungcuphe obuthile, futhi ngalokho-ke alekelele umnotho ukuthi ukhule.

eng: we will give priority attention to the economic sectors that have the greatest potential for growth.
zul: sizogxila kakhudlwana futhi sibeke eqhulwini leyo mikhakha yomnotho ebonisa amathuba aphakeme okukhula.

eng: drawing on our successes in the automotive sector, we will implement master plans developed with business and labour in industries like clothing and textiles, gas, chemicals and plastics, renewables, and steel and metals fabrication sectors.
zul: ngokusebenzela phezu kwempumelelo esiyizuzile emkhakheni wezimoto, sizoqalisa izinhlelo-ngqangi ezenziwe ngokubambisana nabamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi ezimbonini ezinjengemboni yomkhakha wezingubo zokugqoka, owendwangu, owegesi yemvelo, owamakhemikhali nemikhiqizo kacwazi, owemikhiqizo evuselelekayo, kanye nowokukhiqizwa kwensimbi nemikhiqizo esansimbi.

eng: we are going to substantially expand the agriculture and agro-processing sector by supporting key value chains and products, developing new markets and reducing our reliance on agricultural imports.
zul: sizowukhulisa futhi siwunwebe kakhulu umkhakha wezolimo nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo ngokuthi sisekele uchungechunge lokukhiqizwa kanye nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, sibheke amazwe nezindawo ezintsha esizothengisa kuzona imikhiqizo yethu futhi sinciphise ukuthembela kwethu emikhiqizweni yezolimo evela emazweni angaphandle.

eng: we will bolster the mining industry by developing markets for south african minerals through targeted beneficiation, reduced costs of inputs, and increased research and development.
zul: sizoyiqinisa futhi siyeseke imboni yezimayini ngokuthi sibheke amazwe nezindawo okuzothengiswa kuzona izimbiwa zaseningizimu afrika, ngokuthi silungise imikhiqizo yezimbiwa ethile, okuzokwenza ukuthi ikhuphuke ikhwalithi ngokunjalo nenanintengo laleyo mikhiqizo, sinciphise izindleko zokukhiqiza izimbiwa futhi sikhuphule nocwaningo kanye nokuthuthukiswa.

eng: through spatial interventions like special economic zones, reviving local industrial parks, business centres, digital hubs and township and village enterprises, we will bring economic development to local areas.
zul: ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuqhuba ibhizinisi, njengezizinda zomnotho ezikhethekile, ukuvuselelwa kwamapaki ezimboni endawo, izizinda zebhizinisi, izizinda zobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye namabhizinisi asemalokishini kanye nawasezindaweni ezisemakhaya, sizoletha intuthuko yezomnotho eduze kwezindawo okuhlala kuzona abantu.

eng: we will also focus on small and medium enterprises in our cities, townships and rural areas and create market places where they trade their products.
zul: sizogxila emabhizinisini asafufusa emadolobheni ethu, emalokishini kanye nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya futhi sakhe nezindawo zemakethe yokuhweba lapho osomabhizinisi bezothengisa khona imikhiqizo yabo.

eng: we will make good on our ambition to more than double international tourist arrivals to 21 million by 2030. this will be achieved through the renewal of the country’s brand, introducing a world-class visa regime and a significant focus on chinese and indian markets and air arrivals from the rest of our continent.
zul: sizoyifezekisa inhloso nesifiso sethu sokukhulisa ngokuphindwe kabili inani lezivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ezivakashela kuleli, liyifinyelele ezigidini ezingama-21 ngaphambi kowezi-2030.

eng: we are determined to ensure that tourists who come to our country are safe.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngokuthi sivuselele isasasa lokuvakashela kuleli lizwe futhi senze leli lizwe libe yizwe elihehayo, sethule inqubo yokukhishwa kwezimvume zokungena nokuvakashela kuleli (ama-visa) ezisezingeni lomhlaba, futhi sigxile ikakhulukazi ekuheheni abavakashi abavela kwelase-china kanye nase-india, ngokunjalo nezivakashi ezifika kuleli ngendiza, ezivela emazweni aleli zwekazi lethu, i-afrika.

eng: we will expand our high-tech industry by ensuring that the legal and regulatory framework promotes innovation, scaling up skills development for young people in new technologies, and reducing data costs.
zul: sizoyikhulisa imboni yezobuchwepheshe nobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi imithetho kanye nemithethonqubo elawulayo igqugquzela ukuqanjwa kwezinto ezintsha, sithuthukise amakhono abantu abasha kwezobuchwepheshe obusha, futhi sinciphise nezindleko ze-data.

eng: wherever we have gone, young people have continuously raised the issue of the excessive high data costs in south africa.
zul: nomaphi lapho besihamba khona, abantu abasha bebelokhu bekhalaza ngenkinga yezindleko ze-data eziphakeme kakhulu eningizimu afrika.

eng: to provide impetus to this process, within the next month, the minister of communications will issue the policy direction to the independent communication authority of south africa to commence the spectrum licensing process.
zul: ukuze sifake umfutho kule nqubo, kule nyanga ezayo, ungqongqoshe wezokuxhumana uzokhipha umyalelo oqondiswe ophikweni oluzimele lwezokuxhumana lwaseningizimu afrika (i-icasa) ukuthi luqalise inqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwamalayisensi omthamo wamagagasi okusakaza nokuthunyelwa kolwazi ngomoya.

eng: this process will include measures to promote competition, transformation, inclusive growth of the sector and universal access.
zul: le nqubo izobandakanya izinyathelo zokukhuthaza ukuncintisana, uguquko, ukukhuliswa kwalo mkhakha ngendlela ebandakanya umuntu wonke kanye nokuqinisekisa ukufinyelela kwabantu bonke.

eng: this is a vital part of bringing down the costs of data, which is essential both for economic development and for unleashing opportunities for young people.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye esemqoka ekwehliseni izindleko ze-data, okuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni komnotho kanjalo nasekuvulweni kwamathuba aqondiswe entsheni.

eng: we call on the telecommunications industry to further bring down the cost of data so that it is in line with the pricing of other countries in the world.
zul: siyayinxusa imboni yengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana ukuthi iphinde izehlise futhi izindleko ze-data ukuze inanintengo le-data lilingane nelamanye amazwe omhlaba.

eng: we are intensifying our investment drive.
zul: siyawuqinisa impela umkhankaso wethu wokuheha utshalomali.

eng: of the r300 billion of investments announced at our inaugural investment conference last year, just over r250 billion worth of projects has entered implementation phase.
zul: kutshalomali olungamabhiliyoni angama-300 amarandi olwamenyezelwa kwingqungquthela yotshalomali yokuqala ngqa eyabanjwa ngonyaka odlule, kunemiklamo esiqalisiwe yenani elingaphezulu nje kancane kwamabhiliyoni angama-250 amarandi.

eng: we continue to build a pipeline of investments, which will be showcased at the second south african investment conference to be held from 5 to 7 november.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwakha umgudu wotshalomali olungenayo kuleli, futhi lokhu kuzoboniswa kwingqungquthela yesibili yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika ezobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyisi-5 kuze kube ngumhla ziyisi-7 kulwezi.

eng: at a time of uncertainty, the work of the investment envoys has built important bridges between government and the business community.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nongabazane, umsebenzi wamanxusa otshalomali sewuvule amaxhama okuxhumana nokusebenzisana asemqoka kakhulu phakathi kukahulumeni namabhizinisi.

eng: from their feedback, it is clear that much more still needs to be done to improve the investment climate.
zul: uma sibheka imbuyisambiko esiyithole kubona, kuyacaca ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele kwenziwe ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono isimo okusetshenzelwa ngaphansi kwaso esiphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali.

eng: this includes reviewing the way government coordinates work to resolve challenges faced by investors and reforming our investment promotion policy and architecture.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukubuyekezwa kwendlela olawula ngayo umsebenzi wokuxazulula izinselelo abahlangabezana nazo abatshalizimali kanye nokuphucula nokuhlela kabusha inqubomgomo yokukhuthaza utshalomali kanye nohlaka lwesakhiwo sayo.

eng: good progress has been made through the public-private growth initiative, which is being championed by minister nkosazana dlamini zuma, mr roelf meyer and dr johan van zyl slabbert.
zul: mkhulu umsebenzi esesiwenzile ngaphansi kohlelo lokukhulisa umnotho ngobambiswano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele oluholwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlamini-zuma, umnu roelf meyer kanye nodkt johan van zyl slabbert.

eng: the private sector has committed to invest r840 billion in 43 projects over 19 sectors and creating 155 000 jobs in the next five years.
zul: umkhakha ozimele usuthembise ukutshala imali engamabhiliyoni angama-840 amarandi emiklamweni engama-43 ngaphansi kwemikhakha eyi-19, futhi lokho kuzodala amathuba omsebenzi ayizi-155 000 kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.

eng: in discussions with business, government has committed to remove the policy impediments and accelerate implementation of these projects.
zul: ezingxoxweni ebezibanjwe nabamabhizinisi, uhulumeni usezwakalise ukuzibophezela ekususeni izithiyo nemigoqo ephathelene nezinqubomgomo nemithetho eyinkimbinkimbi futhi asheshise ukuqaliswa kwale miklamo.

eng: we are urgently working on a set of priority reforms to improve the ease of doing business by consolidating and streamlining regulatory processes, automating permit and other applications, and reducing the cost of compliance.
zul: senza imizamo esheshayo yokuletha izinguquko ezisemqoka okuhloswe ngazo ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi kuleli, ngokuthi sihlanganise futhi sihlele kabusha imithethonqubo elawulayo, senze kube kula kakhulu ukuthola izimvume nokufaka izicelo ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, futhi kuncishiswe nezindleko zokuthotshelwa kwenzinqubo ezibekiwe.

eng: infrastructure is a critical area of investment that supports structural transformation, growth and job creation.
zul: ingqalasizinda ingumkhakha osemqoka kakhulu okumele kutshalwe kuwona izimali, osekela ukulethwa koguquko ezikhungweni, ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

eng: it is essential to our economic rejuvenation, to giving meaning and effect to our new dawn.
zul: ingqalasiizinda ibaluleke kakhulu futhi ekuvuselelweni komnotho wezwe, kanye nokuletha nokuqalisa isikhathi esisha sokuvuselela nokuthuthukisa izwe lethu.

eng: our new approach to infrastructure development is based on stronger partnerships between the public and private sectors, and with local communities.
zul: indlela entsha esizoyilandela ekuthuthukisweni kwengqalasizinda isekelwe phezu kobambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele, kanye nemiphakathi yendawo.

eng: it includes a special package of financial and institutional measures to boost construction and prioritise water infrastructure, roads and student accommodation through a more efficient use of budgeted money.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya inhlanganisela ekhethekile yezinyathelo eziphathelene nezimali kanye nalezo eziphathelene nokuphatha nokulawula okuhloswe ngazo ukukhuthaza umsebenzi wokwakha kanye nokubeka eqhulwini ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi, imigwaqo kanye nezindlu zokuhlalisa abafundi, ngokuthi kusetshenziswe ngobunyoninco leyo mali eyabelwe le miklamo.

eng: as announced in the previous sona, government has set aside r100 billion to seed the infrastructure fund.
zul: njengoba kwamenyezelwa kwi-sona edlule, uhulumeni ubeke eceleni isamba esingamabhiliyoni ayi-100 amarandi ngenhloso yokuxhasa nokugqugquzela isikhwama sengqalasizinda.

eng: we are working to institutionalise the fund, which will be managed by the development bank of southern africa, with the newly configured department of public works and infrastructure playing an oversight role.
zul: senza imizamo yokuthi lesi sikhwama sibe yisikhungo, esizolawulwa yibhange lentuthuko laseningizimu afrika (i-dbsa), futhi umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nengqalasizinda ohlelwe kabusha yiwona ozoqapha umsebenzi owenziwa yilesi sikhungo.

eng: we have been doing this in consultation with private investors, such as pension funds, who are enthusiastic about participating in the infrastructure fund.
zul: lokhu sikwenza ngokubonisana kanye nokubambisana nabatshalizimali abazimele, abafana nezikhungo ezilawula izikhwama zempesheni, ezingabatshalizimali abanentshisekelo ekubambeni iqhaza esikhwameni sengqalasizinda.

eng: these reforms will ensure better planning of infrastructure projects, rigorous feasibility and preparatory work, improved strategic management, impeccable execution and better governance.
zul: lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuhlelwa kangcono kwemiklamo yengqalasizinda, umsebenzi onohlonze wokuhlola ukuthi ingqalasizinda izokwenzeka ngempumelelo yini nokwenza amalungiselelo afanelekile, ukuphucula ukuphatha okukhethekile, ukuqaliswa ngobunyoninco kwemisebenzi yengqalasizinda kanye nokuphatha okuhle.

eng: this will provide a much-need boost to the construction sector which has been in the doldrums for a while.
zul: lokhu kuhlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okudingeka kakhulu emkhakheni wezokwakha osekuphele isikhathi eside impela ufadalele.

eng: we will stimulate local demand and grow south african manufacturing by making sure the ‘buy local’ campaign is everywhere and ever-present.
zul: sizogqugquzela futhi sikhuthaze abantu ukuthi bathenge imikhiqizo nezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli futhi sikhulise umkhakha wezokukhiqiza waseningizimu afrika ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi umkhankaso ‘wokuthengwa kwezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli’ (i-‘buy local’) ungundabuzekwayo futhi ubonakala yonke indawo.

eng: we call on all south africans to deliberately and consistently buy locally-made goods.
zul: siyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi, ngenhloso futhi ngokuqhubekayo, bathenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli.

eng: the suit, the shirt and the tie i am wearing today was locally made by south african textile workers at the house of monatic, here in salt river cape town.
zul: le sudu nehembe kanye nothayi engikugqokile namhlanje kwakhiwe ngabasebenzi bemboni yendwangu yaseningizimu afrika e-house of monatic, khona lapha e-salt river edolobheni lasekapa.

eng: let us all buy locally-made goods to drive up demand in our economy.
zul: sonke masithenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli ukuze sikhulise isibalo sabantu abathenga impahla ekhiqizwe kuleli.

eng: within this next year, we seek to conclude agreements with retailers to stock more south african goods on their shelves and to actively promote the great products made by south african workers.
zul: kulo nyaka esiwuphethe, sifuna ukwenza izivumelwano nezitolo ezithengisa impahla ukuthi ziqinisekise ukuthi zithenga izimpahla ezikhiqizwe eningizimu afrika futhi ziyikhangise ngenkuthalo imikhiqizo emihle kakhulu eyakhiwe ngabasebenzi baseningizimu afrika.

eng: at the same time, we will promote our products more actively to the rest of the african continent and the world.
zul: futhi kusenjalo sizokhangisa ngomdlandla omkhulu imikhiqizo yethu ezwekazini lase-afrika kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

eng: these measures are underpinned by our strong commitment to a macroeconomic and fiscal policy framework that will continue to boost confidence and investment.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zisekelwe phezu kwesibophezelo sethu esiqinile kwinqubomgomo yomnotho-jikelele kanye neyezezimali ezoqhubeka nokukhuthaza ukwethenjwa kwaleli lizwe futhi kukhuthaze nokutshalwa kwezimali.

eng: we are committed to prudent borrowing and stringent expenditure management to stabilise our public finances and lower the debt trajectory.
zul: sizibophezele ekubolekeni izimali ngobuhlakani obukhulu ukuze singaboleki imali engaphezu kwamandla ethu okukhokha leyo mali esiyibolekile futhi sizibophezele ekusebenziseni imali ngokucophelela okukhulu ukuze siqinisekise uzinzo ezimalini zikahulumeni futhi sinciphise nesikweletu sezwe.

eng: the south african reserve bank is a critical institution of our democracy, enjoying wide credibility and standing within the country and internationally.
zul: ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika lisiyikhungo esisemqoka kakhulu ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, esithenjwayo futhi esihlonishwa kakhulu kuleli nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

eng: price stability is a necessary but not a sufficient condition for economic growth.
zul: uzinzo lwamananintengo luyadingeka impela, kepha-ke alwanele ekuqinisekiseni ukukhula komnotho.

eng: rising prices of goods and services erode the purchasing power of all south africans, but especially that of the poor.
zul: amananintengo ezimpahla nezinsizakalo adlondlobalayo anciphisa amandla okuthenga abo bonke abantu baseningzimu afrika, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

eng: inflation further undermines the competitiveness of our exports and our import-competing firms, putting industries and jobs at risk.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kunciphisa amandla okuncintisana ezimpahla zakuleli ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kanye namafemu akuleli akhiqiza izimpahla ezincintisana nezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezakhiwe kwamanye amazwe, futhi lokhu kubeka engcupheni izimboni zakuleli kanye nemisebenzi.

eng: for these reasons, our constitution mandates the south african reserve bank to protect the value of our currency in the interest of balanced and sustainable growth.
zul: ngenxa yalesi sizathu-ke, umthethosisekelo wethu ugunyaza ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika ukuthi livikele isilinganisontengo semali yakuleli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukukhula komnotho okulingene futhi okusimeme.

eng: today, we reaffirm this constitutional mandate, which the reserve bank must pursue independently, without fear, favour or prejudice.
zul: namuhla, sithanda ukuligcizelela leli gunya elihlinzekwe ngokomthethosisekelo, okumele lifezekiswe yibhange lombuso ngokuzimela, ngaphandle kokuchema noma ukucwasa.

eng: our constitution also requires that there should be regular consultation between the reserve bank and the minister of finance to promote macroeconomic coordination, all in the interests of employment creation and economic growth.
zul: umthethosisekelo wethu uyalela futhi ukuthi kube nokubonisana okuqhubekayo phakathi kwebhangengodla kanye nongqongqoshe wezezimali ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo emnothweni wezwe wonkana, ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokukhulisa umnotho.

eng: if we are to be internationally competitive, if we are to attract investment, we must address the high cost of doing business in south africa, and complicated and lengthy regulatory processes.
zul: uma sifuna ukuncintisana ngempumelelo namazwe omhlaba, futhi uma sifuna ukuheha utshalomali, kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokunciphisa izindleko eziphakeme kakhulu zokwenza ibhizinisi eningizimu afrika, futhi sixegise imithethonqubo nemidanti eyinkimbinkimbi futhi ewundendende okumele ilandelwe.

eng: we must reach a point where no company should wait more than six months for a permit or licence and new companies should be able to be registered within a day.
zul: kumele sifinyelele esigabeni lapho ingekho neyodwa inkampani okumele ilinde isikhathi esingaphezu kwezinyanga eziyisithupha ngaphambi kokuthi ithole imvume noma ilayisensi yokusebenza futhi kumele kube yinto elula nje ukubhalisa inkampani entsha ngosuku olulodwa nje vo.

eng: we will continue to reduce the cost of doing business by reducing port export tariffs, pursuing lowest cost electricity generation options, and making rail transport more competitive and efficient.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokunciphisa izindleko zokwenza ibhizinisi ngokuthi sinciphise intela yezimpahla ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle, sizame ukuthola nokusebenzisa izindlela zokuphehla ugesi ezishimbile, futhi senze umkhakha wokuthutha impahla ngezitimela ube sesimweni sokuncintisana neminye imikhakha yokuthuthwa kwempahla futhi usebenze ngobunyoninco.

eng: guided by the ndp, it is our responsibility to pursue inclusive, sustainable development that is resilient in the face of climate change.
zul: ngokuholwa yi-ndp, kungumthwalo nomsebenzi wethu ukuqinisekisa intuthuko ebandakanya umuntu wonke futhi esimeme, ezokwazi ukumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

eng: working in partnership with the private sector, labour and the international community we will step up our adaptation and mitigation efforts.
zul: ngokubambisana nomkhakha ozimele, abasebenzi kanye namazwe omhlaba sizoqinisa futhi sikhuphule imizamo yethu yokumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu futhi sinciphise nomthelela omubi walokhu.

eng: we have the opportunity to be at the forefront of green growth, of low-carbon industrialisation, of pioneering new technologies and of taking quantum leaps towards the economy of the future.
zul: sinethuba lokuqinisekisa ukuthi sihamba phambili emizamweni yokukhulisa umnotho ngendlela ebhekelela futhi inakekele imvelo, sibe nezimboni ezisebenzisa izindlela-kusebenza ezikhiqiza ikhabhoni encane kakhulu futhi ezingawuncolisi umkhathi nemvelo, sihambe phambili ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe obusha futhi sithathe amagxathu amakhulukazi aphokophele emnothweni wangomuso.

eng: we must increase the contribution of renewable and clean energy to our national energy mix and explore the potential of the hydrogen economy.
zul: kumele siwukhulise umthamo wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo futhi ongayingcolisi imvelo, kwizinhlobo zemithombo kagesi ehlukahlukene esetshenziswa kule lizwe, futhi sizame ukucubungula nokubhekisisa ukuthi ngeke yini kube wusizo ukuthi siguqukele emnothweni ogxile kakhulu ekusetshenzisweni kwegesi ihayidrojini.

eng: faster economic growth also requires accelerated land reform in rural and urban areas and a clear property rights regime.
zul: ukukhula komnotho okusheshayo kudinga futhi ukuthi kusheshiswe izinguquko kwezomhlaba ezindaweni ezisemakhaya kanye nezosemadolobheni futhi kube khona inqubo-kusebenza ecacile ephathelene nokuphathwa kwamalungelo omhlaba.

eng: we have received the report of the presidential advisory panel on land reform and agriculture, which was led by the deputy president, which will now be presented to cabinet for consideration.
zul: sesiwutholile umbiko wethimba elikhethekile lokweluleka umongameli mayelana nezinguquko kwezomhlaba nezolimo, elabe liholwa yiphini likamongameli, manje osuzokwethulwa phambi kwekhabhinethi ukuze ucutshungulwe.

eng: the panel’s recommendations will inform the finalisation of a comprehensive, far-reaching and transformative land reform programme.
zul: izincomo zaleli thimba elikhethekile yizona ezizosetshenziswa ukuhlanganisa nokuphothula uhlelo lwezinguquko kwezomhlaba olubanzi futhi oluzoletha uguquko olunohlonze.

eng: in the immediate term, government will accelerate efforts to identify and release public land that is suitable for smart, urban settlements and for farming.
zul: kulesi sikhashana esifushane esizayo, uhulumeni uzosheshisa imizamo yokuhlonza kanye nokwaba umhlaba kahulumeni okulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, onazo izinsiza nezidingongqangi zesimanjemanje, futhi uhulumeni uzokwaba nomhlaba ozosetshenziselwa ukulima.

eng: in the stimulus and recovery package announced last year, we promised to prioritise funding for emerging farmers.
zul: kwiphakheji yokukhuthaza nokuvuselela umnotho eyamenyezelwa ngonyaka odlule, sathembisa ukuthi sizokubeka eqhulwini ukuxhaswa ngezimali kwabalimi abasafufusa.

eng: over the medium-term budget period, r3.9 billion has been allocated to the land bank to support black commercial farmers.
zul: kulesi sikhathi sesabelo esimaphakathi, ibhange lomhlaba labelwe imali engamabhiliyoni ama-3.9 amarandi ngenhloso yokweseka nokuxhasa abalimi abamnyama abahwebayo.

eng: an essential part of south africa’s growth strategy is the integration of our economy with those of our neighbours and the rest of our continent.
zul: ingxenye esemqoka kakhulu yeqhingasu lokukhulisa umnotho leningizimu afrika wukudidiyelwa komnotho wakuleli neminotho yamazwe angomakhelwane kanye neminotho yamazwe aleli zwekazi lonkana.

eng: the african continental free trade area will improve the movement of goods and services, capital and means of production across the continent.
zul: isizinda sokuhwebelana mahhala kwamazwe ezwekazi lase-afrika, (i-afcfta), sizothuthukisa futhi senze ngcono ukuhamba nokuthunyelwa kwezimpahla kanye nezinsizakalo, ingqala-bhizinisi kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza zokukhiqiza impahla kwizwekazi lonkana.

eng: our revitalised industrial strategy focuses on the expansion of our trade and investment links with the rest of the southern african region and the continent at large.
zul: iqhingasu leningizimu afrika elivuseleliwe futhi lafakwa nomfutho ligxile ekukhuliseni ubudlelwano bokuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwelizwe lethu nesifunda sonkana samazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika kanye nezwekazi lonkana.

eng: within the southern african development community, we will prioritise development of cross-border value chains in key sectors such as energy, mining and mineral beneficiation, manufacturing, infrastructure and agro-processing.
zul: ngaphakathi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika (i-sadc), sizobeka eqhulwini uchungechunge lokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo kanye nokuthunyelwa nokuhanjiswa kwayo phakathi kwamazwe angaphansi kwale nhlangano, okuyimikhiqizo yemikhakha enjengowezamandla, owezimayini nokuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yemikhiqizo yezimbiwa, owezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, owezengqalasizinda kanye nowokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

eng: fellow south africans,the growth of our economy will have little value unless it creates employment on a far greater scale.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukukhula komnotho wezwe ngeke neze kuwenze umehluko ophawulekayo uma kungalekeleli ekwakhiweni kwamathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

eng: the fact that the unemployment rate among young south africans is more than 50% is essentially a national crisis that demands urgent, innovative and coordinated solutions where all of us should see it as a requirement to work together.
zul: njengoba izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni lingaphezu kwama-50% kusho ukuthi izwe libhekene nengwadla enkulukazi edinga ukuthi kutholakale izixazululo eziphuthumayo, ezihambisana nokusetshenziswa kwamaqhingasu amasha futhi ezihambelanayo, lapho wonke umuntu kumele akubone njengento edingekayo futhi esemqoka kakhulu ukuthi kusetshenzwe ngokubambisana.

eng: and because more young people are entering the labour force every year, the economy needs to create far more jobs for youth than it currently does.
zul: futhi njengoba abantu abasha bengena ngobuningi minyaka yonke esigabeni sabantu abathungatha amathuba omsebenzi, umnotho wezwe kumele wakhe amathuba omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni angaphezulu kakhulu kwamathuba avulekayo njengamanje.

eng: merely to keep the youth unemployment rate steady.
zul: ngenhloso nje yokuqinisekisa ukuthi alidlondlobali ngokweqile izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni.

eng: the brutal reality is that when it comes to youth unemployment, we have to run just to remain in the same place.
zul: iqiniso elimsulwa wukuthi mayelana nenkinga yokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni, kumele senze imizamo enohlonze futhi ephuthumayo, ngenhloso nje yokunciphisa amanani aphakeme kakhulu esibhekene nawo njengamanje entsha ehleli emakhaya engasebenzi, singakayibali intsha esazophuma ezikhungweni zemfundo, nayo ifune umsebenzi.

eng: it is therefore essential that we proceed without delay to implement a comprehensive plan – driven and coordinated from the presidency – to create no fewer than two million new jobs for young people within the next decade.
zul: ngakho-ke kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siluqalise ngokushesha okukhulu uhlelo olubanzi – oluqhutshwa futhi lulawulwe yihhovisi likamongameli – ukuze kwakhiwe amathuba amasha omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni, angekho ngaphansi kwezigidi ezimbili kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

eng: this plan will work across government departments and all three tiers of government, in partnership with the private sector.
zul: lolu hlelo luzosebenza kuyo yonke iminyango kahulumeni futhi lusebenze kuzona zontathu izigaba zikahulumeni, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

eng: we are already working with the private sector to create pathways into work for young people through scaling up existing pathway management networks.
zul: sesiqalile kakade ukusebenzisana nabomkhakha ozimele ekwakheni imigudu yokufaka abantu abasha emsebenzini ngokuthi sikhulise futhi sithuthukise izinhlelo ezikhona njengamanje zokuphathwa kwemigudu yokufakwa kwentsha emsebenzini.

eng: these are networks that allow young people who opt in increased visibility, network support and opportunities to signal their availability for jobs and self-employment.
zul: lezi yizinhlelo ezivumela labo bantu abasha ababhalise ngaphansi kwazo ukuthi babonakale kalula, bathole ukwesekwa kanye namathuba azokwenza ukuthi bavele obala ukuze babonakale kalula ukuthi badinga amathuba omsebenzi noma amathuba okusungula amabhizinisi.

eng: they make sure that youth from poorer households – and young women in particular – are empowered to take up the new opportunities.
zul: lezi zinhlelo ziyaqinisekisa ukuthi intsha evela emakhaya ahlwempu – futhi ikakhulukazi abesifazane abasebasha – iyahlonyiswa futhi icijwe ngendlela efanele ukuze ikwazi ukuwabamba ngazo zombili amathuba amasha avelayo.

eng: government will continue to provide employment through the expanded public works programme, especially in labour intensive areas like maintenance, clearing vegetation, plugging water leaks and constructing roads.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokuhlinzeka amathuba omsebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (i-epwp), ikakhulukazi emikhakheni edinga abasebenzi abaningi njengomkhakha wokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda, ukuhlakulwa kokhula nokususwa kwezihlahla nezitshalo ezingadingekile, ukuvalwa kwamapayipi amanzi avuzayo kanye nokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo.

eng: we will continue to develop programmes to ensure that economically excluded young people are work ready and absorbed into sectors where ‘jobs demand’ is growing.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokuthuthukisa izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha abangasebenzi bakulungele ukusebenza futhi bayafakwa emsebenzini kuleyo mikhakha lapho kunamathuba omsebenzi akhulayo.

eng: these sectors include global business processing services, agricultural value chains, technical installation, repair and maintenance and new opportunities provided through the digital economy and the fourth industrial revolution.
zul: le mikhakha ibandakanya imikhakha enjengowezinsizakalo zamazwe ngamazwe zokuhlinzeka usizo ngocingo, uchungechunge lomsebenzi wokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, ukuxhunywa kwemishini yezobuchwepheshe, ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kwemishini isesimweni sokusebenza esihle kanye namathuba amasha ahlinzekwa ngumnotho wezobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye noguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje.

eng: government will also ensure that young people are employed in social economy jobs such as early childhood development and health care.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka futhi nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayaqashwa ezinhlanganweni nasezikhungweni zomphakathi ezinjengezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane kanye nezinhlangano ezihlinzeka ngosizo lwezempilo nokunakekelwa.

eng: we will expand the national youth service to take on 50 000 young people a year.
zul: sizolukhulisa uhlelo lukazwelonke lokuvulwa kwemisebenzi eqondiswe entsheni ukuze luqashe abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 njalo ngonyaka.

eng: government will support tech-enabled platforms for self-employed youth in rural areas and townships.
zul: uhulumeni uzosekela futhi axhase izinhlelo-kusebenza zobuchwepheshe eziqondiswe kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nasemalokishini.

eng: we will expand our programmes to enable young people to gain paid workplace experience through initiatives like the youth employment service, and also facilitating work-based internships.
zul: sizozikhulisa izinhlelo zethu ukuze silekelele abantu abasha bakwazi ukuthola ulwazi nesipiliyoni somsebenzi lapho bezokwenza umsebenzi abazowuholela, ngaphansi kwezinhlelo ezinjengohlelo lophiko lokuqashwa kwentsha (i-yes), futhi silekelele intsha ekutholeni amathuba okuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini.

eng: we are going to roll out small business incubation centres to provide youth-driven start-ups with financial and technical advice as they begin their journeys.
zul: sizohlinzeka ngezizinda zokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emabhizinisini amancane ngenhloso yokunikeza abantu abasha izeluleko eziphathelene nezimali kanye nokuqhutshwa kwebhizinisi ngenkathi besungula amabhizinisi abo.

eng: yesterday, i had the great privilege to meet and engage in dialogue with several young south africans who are doing simply amazing work to build our country and develop our people.
zul: izolo, kube yintokozo enkulu kimina ukuhlangana nokuxoxisana neqenjana labantu abasha baseningizimu afrika abenza umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu ekwakheni izwe lethu kanye nokuthuthukisa abantu bakithi.

eng: they are entrepreneurs and community builders, activists and artists.
zul: bangosomabhizinisi, abathuthukisi bomphakathi, izishoshovu kanye namaciko.

eng: if there is one thing we have learned from our engagements with this country’s youth is that we cannot impose our solutions on them: everything we have to do must be led by young people themselves.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka esizifundile kulezi zingxoxo ebesizibambe nentsha yaleli lizwe wukuthi akumele siqhamuke nezixazululo ezicatshangwa yithina bese sithi mabazisebenzise: konke esikwenzayo kumele kuholwe ngabantu abasha ngokwabo.

eng: they have told us what they want, and what they need.
zul: basitshelile ukuthi yini abayifunayo, futhi yini abayidingayo.

eng: they want to be employed, yes, but they also want to become employers.
zul: yebo, bayakufuna impela ukuqashwa, kepha-ke futhi bafuna nokuba ngabaqashi ngokwabo.

eng: they are brimming with ideas, they are at the forefront of innovation, and they want to do things for themselves.
zul: baqhamuke nemiqondo-mbono eminingi futhi ehlukahlukene, bahamba phambili ekusetshenzisweni kwezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha, futhi bafuna ukuzenzela izinto ngokwabo.

eng: we have to support the fire of entrepreneurship because the fortunes of this country depend on the energies and creative talent of our young people.
zul: kumele siyeseke le ntshisekelo yentsha ekusunguleni amabhizinisi ngoba phela impumelelo yaleli lizwe incike emdlandleni wabantu abasha kanye nasethalenteni labo lokuqhamuka nemiqondo emisha kanye nezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha.

eng: fellow south africans,if we are to ensure that within the next decade, every 10-year-old will be able to read for meaning, we will need to mobilise the entire nation behind a massive reading campaign.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo zonke izingane ezineminyaka eyi-10 ziyakwazi ukufunda futhi zikuqonda kahle lokho ezikufundayo, kumele sigqugquzele isizwe sonke ukuthi siweseke umkhankaso omkhulukazi wokufunda.

eng: early reading is the basic foundation that determines a child’s educational progress, through school, through higher education and into the workplace.
zul: ukufunda kwengane isencane kuyinto eyisisekelo, futhi ukuphumelela nokuqhubekela phambili kwengane emfundweni yayo kuncike kulokhu.

eng: all other interventions – from the work being done to improve the quality of basic education to the provision of free higher education for the poor, from our investment in technical and vocational education training colleges to the expansion of workplace learning – will not produce the results we need unless we first ensure that children can read.
zul: kusukela esikoleni kuqhubeke njalo kuyongena emfundweni ephakeme kuze kuyofinyelela nasemsebenzini imbala.

eng: all foundation and intermediate phase teachers are to be trained to teach reading in english and the african languages, and we are training and deploying a cohort of experienced coaches to provide high quality on-site support to teachers.
zul: zonke ezinye izinhlelo zethu – kusukela emsebenzini owenziwayo ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo eyisisekelo kuyofinyelela ekuhlinzekweni kwemfundo ephakeme yamahhala kubantu abahlwempu, kusukela kutshalomali nokwesekwa esikunikeza amakolishi ezobuchwepheshe nemisebenzi yobungoti bezandla kuyofinyelela ekukhulisweni kwezinhlelo zokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini – ngeke neze zikhiqize imiphumela emihle uma singaqali ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane ziyakwazi ukufunda.

eng: we are implementing the early grade reading programme, which consists of an integrated package of lesson plans, additional reading materials and professional support to foundation phase teachers.
zul: yizinhlelo ezinjengomkhankaso wokufunda kazwelonke ezizokwenza sikwazi ukuqhuba ngempumelelo lo mzamo owenziwa ezweni lonkana.

eng: this forms part of the broader efforts to strengthen the basic education system by empowering school leadership teams, improving the capabilities of teachers and ensuring a more consistent measurement of progress for grades three, six and nine.
zul: bonke othisha bezinga eliyisisekelo kanye nelimaphakathi bazoqeqeshelwa ukufundisa isingisi kanye nezilimi zabomdabu, futhi njengamanje siqeqesha amaqembu abaqeqeshi esizobathumela ezikoleni ukuthi bayohlinzeka ngosizo olusezingeni eliphezulu kothisha ngaphakathi esikoleni.

eng: we also have to prepare our young people for the jobs of the future.
zul: kumele futhi abantu abasha sibacijele imisebenzi yangomuso.

eng: this is why we are introducing subjects like coding and data analytics at a primary school level.
zul: yingakho, ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi, sethula izifundo enjengomsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamakhodi ezinhlelo-kusebenza zamakhompyutha (izifundo ze-coding) kanye nomsebenzi wokuhlola nokuhlaziya i-data (i-data analytics).

eng: honourable members,the south africa we want is a country where all people are safe and feel safe.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, iningizimu afrika esiyifunayo iyizwe lapho bonke bantu bengazizwa nje bephephile, kepha bephephile impela.

eng: let us therefore, work together to ensure that violent crime is at least halved over the next decade.
zul: ngakho-ke, masisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ubugebengu obuhambisana nodlame buncishiswa okungenani ngesigamu kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

eng: the first step is to increase police visibility by employing more policewomen and men, and also to create a more active role for citizens through effective community policing forums.
zul: isinyathelo sokuqala wukukhulisa inani lamaphoyisa abonakala ehamba hamba emphakathini, ngokuthi kuqashwe amaphoyisa angeziwe, kanye nokwenza isimo esizoholela ekutheni izakhamuzi zibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo ngaphansi kwamaqenjana omphakathi asebenzisana namaphoyisa (ama-cpf) asebenza kahle.

eng: currently, there are over 5 000 students registered for basic training in our police training colleges and we envisage that this number will be increased to 7 000 per cycle over the next two intakes.
zul: njengamanje, bangaphezu kwezi-5 000 abafundi ababhaliselwe ukuqeqeshwa okuyisisekelo emakolishi ethu okuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi sibheke ukuthi leli nani likhuphuke liyofinyelela kwizi-7 000 ngomjikelezo ngamunye kumahlandla okuqeqeshwa kwamaphoyisa amabili ezayo.

eng: we are working to improve success rates in investigating and prosecuting crimes, and to ensure better training and professionalisation throughout the criminal justice system.
zul: senza imizamo yokwenza ngcono amazinga empumelelo yokuphenywa nokushushiswa kwamacala, kanye nokuqiniseka ukuqeqeshwa okungcono kanye nokusebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco ohlelweni lwezobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu.

eng: violent crime is a societal problem that requires a society-wide response.
zul: ubugebengu obuhambisana nodlame buyinkinga yezwe lonkana, futhi edinga ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo ezibandakanya abantu bonke.

eng: we are working with civil society organisations on strategies to end gender-based violence and femicide.
zul: sizebenzisana nezinhlangano zomphakathi ukuthola amaqhingasu okunqanda nokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane.

eng: following intensive consultations and engagements, we are working towards the establishment of the gender-based violence and femicide council and a national strategic plan that will guide all of us, wherever we are, in our efforts to eradicate this national scourge.
zul: kulandela ukubonisana okunohlonze, senza imizamo yokusungula umkhandlu wokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane kanye nohlelo lukazwelonke olukhethekile oluzoba ngumhlahlandlela wethu sonke, kungakhathalekile ukuthi sikuphi, emizamweni yethu yokuqeda lesi sihlava esisabalele ezweni lonkana.

eng: we are capacitating and equipping the police and court system to support survivors of gender-based violence.
zul: simatasa sicija futhi sihlomise amaphoyisa kanye nezinkantolo ekusekeleni izisulu zodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile.

eng: we are stepping up the fight against drug syndicates through the implementation of the national anti-gang strategy and the revised national drug master plan.
zul: siyayiqinisa impi yokulwisana namaqembu ezigelekeqe eziqhuba ibhizinisi lokuthengisa izidakamizwa, ngokuqalisa iqhingasu likazwelonke lokulwisana namaqembu emigulukudu kanye nohlelo-ngqangi lukazwelonke lokulwisana nezidakamizwa.

eng: ladies and gentlemen,distinguished guests,the achievement of all these objectives requires a capable and developmental state.
zul: manene namanenekazi, zimenywa ezikhethekile, ukufezekiswa kwazo zonke lezi zinjongo kudinga umbuso onamandla nekhono lokusebenza kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezidingekayo, futhi othuthukisayo.

eng: this is a state that not only provides the institutions and infrastructure that enable the economy and society to operate, but that has the means to drive transformation.
zul: lowo akuwona nje umbuso ohlinzeka kuphela ngezikhungo kanye nengqalasizinda ezokwenza ukuthi umnotho wezwe kanye nomphakathi usebenze, kodwa ngumbuso onezindlela-kusebenza zokuletha uguquko.

eng: earlier this month, we announced the reconfiguration of a number of government departments to enable them to deliver on their mandates.
zul: ngasekuqaleni kwale nyanga, samemezela ukuhlelwa kabusha kweminyango kahulumeni eminingana ukuze ikwazi ukwenza kahle imisebenzi ethweswe yona.

eng: our decision was premised on efficiency, cost-containment, cooperative governance and strategic alignment.
zul: isinqumo sethu besisekelwe phezu komzamo wokuqiniseksa ukusebenza ngobunyoninco, ukunciphisa izindleko, ukuphatha ngokubambisana kanye nokuhambelanisa imisebenzi eyenziwa yiminyango kahulumeni ehlukahlukene.

eng: this is the start of a wider process of arresting the decline in state capacity and restructuring our model of service delivery so that it best serves the citizens of our country.
zul: lokhu kuyisiqalo senqubo ebanzi yokunqanda ukufadalala kwamandla okusebenza ombuso kanye nokuhlela kabusha uhlelo-kusebenza lwethu lokuhlinzeka ngezidingo-ngqangi ukuze lukwazi ukuzisebenzela kahle kakhulu izakhamuzi zezwe lethu.

eng: we will be adopting a district-based approach – focusing on the 44 districts and eight metros – to speed up service delivery, ensuring that municipalities are properly supported and adequately resourced.
zul: sizosebenzisa inqubo-kusebenza ezogxila ezifundeni ezingama-44 nemikhandlu-dolobha eyisishiyagalombili ngenhloso yokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi, futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi omasipala bahlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okufanelekile futhi banikezwe nezinsiza-kusebenza ezanele.

eng: to ensure that the state is able to effectively enable economic and social development, it is essential that we strengthen our state-owned enterprises (soes).
zul: ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi umbuso uyakwazi ukuletha kahle intuthuko kwezomnotho kanye nakwezenhlalo yomphakathi, kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siqinise amabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe).

eng: through the presidential soe council, government intends to create alignment between all state-owned companies and to better define their respective mandates.
zul: ngokusebenzisa umkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe, uhulumeni uhlose ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo phakathi kwazo zonke izinkampani zombuso futhi kucaciswe kahle namagunya nemisebenzi ezethweswe yona ngokuhlukahlukana kwazo.

eng: through the council, we will work with the leadership of soes to develop a legal and regulatory environment that promotes innovation and agility and enhances their competitiveness.
zul: ngaphansi kwalo mkhandlu, sizosebenzisana nabaholi bama-soe ukuthuthukisa imithetho nemithethonqubo ezogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezintsha zesimanjemanje ezihambisana nokukhalipha okukhulu futhi kwenziwe ngcono nekhono namandla okuncintisana kwalezi zinkampani nezimbangi zazo kwezebhizinisi.

eng: we will build on the work we have already begun to address problems of poor governance, inefficiency and financial sustainability.
zul: sizokwakhela phezu komsebenzi osuqalisiwe kakade okuhloswe ngawo ukuxazulula izinkinga zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokuhluleka ukusebenza ngobunyoninco kanye nezinkinga eziphathelene nokusimama ngakwezezimali.

eng: we are committed to building an ethical state in which there is no place for corruption, patronage, rent-seeking and plundering of public money.
zul: sizibophezele ekwakheni umbuso olandela izinkambiso zokusebenza ngobuqotho lapho ingekho nakancane inkohlakalo, ukwenzelela, ukuzicebisa ngokungemthetho, kanye nokweba imali kahulumeni.

eng: we want a corps of skilled and professional public servants of the highest moral standards – and dedicated to the public service.
zul: sifuna ukuba neqembu labasebenzi bakahulumeni abanekhono, abasebenza ngobungoti futhi abenza umsebenzi wabo ngobuqotho obukhulu futhi abazinikele emsebenzini wabo wokusebenzela umphakathi.

eng: the decisive steps we have taken to end state capture and fight corruption, including measures to strengthen the national prosecuting authority (npa), special investigating unit (siu), south african revenue service and state security, are achieving important results.
zul: seziqalile ukukhiqiza imiphumela emihle futhi esemqoka izinyathelo esizithathile zokuqeda ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso kanye nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, kubandakanya nezinyathelo zokuqinisa uphiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa), uphiko lokuphenywa kwamacala akhethekile (i-siu), uphiko lokuqoqwa kwentela lwaseningizimu afrika (i-sars) kanye nenhlangano kahulumeni yezokuvikela.

eng: but there is still much more work to do.
zul: kepha-ke usemningi impela umsebenzi okumele wenziwe.

eng: we have asked the national director of public prosecutions to develop a plan to significantly increase the capacity and effectiveness of the npa, including to ensure effective asset forfeiture.
zul: sesinxuse umqondisi kazwelonke wezokushushiswa komphakathi (i-ndpp) ukuthi athuthukise uhlelo oluzophucula futhi luthuthukise kakhudlwana amandla okusebenza kanye nobunyoninco be-npa, kubandakanya nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uqhutshwa kahle futhi ngobunono umsebenzi wokudliwa kwempahla etholakale ezenzweni zobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

eng: we need to ensure that public money stolen is returned and used to deliver services and much-needed basic infrastructure to the poorest communities.
zul: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi iyabuyiswa imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe ukuze isetshenziselwe ukuhlinzeka izidingo-ngqangi kanye nengqalasizinda eyisisekelo edingeka kakhulu emiphakathini edla imbuya ngothi.

eng: we expect that the new siu special tribunal will start its work within the next few months to fast-track civil claims arising from siu investigations, which are currently estimated to be around r14.7 billion.
zul: sibheke ukuthi inkantolo entsha ekhethekile ye-siu iqale umsebenzi wayo kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa ezizayo ngenhloso yokusheshisa amacala okudliwa kwempahla ahlobene nophenyo lwe-siu, njengamanje alinganiselwa kwinani-bungako elingamabhiliyoni ayi-14.7 amarandi.

eng: south africa will continue to play an active role in international relations in the quest for global peace and security, people-centred development and prosperity for all.
zul: iningizimu afrika izoqhubeka nokudlala indima esemqoka kwezobudlelwane bamazwe omhlaba emizamweni yokuqinisekisa ukuthula nokuvikeleka emhlabeni, intuthuko egxile kubantu kanye nokuchuma nokuphumelela kwabantu bonke.

eng: we renew our determination to work in concert with the international community to preserve and protect the rules-based multilateral system with the united nations (un) at its head.
zul: siyakuvuselela ukuzibophezela kwethu ekusebenzisaneni okuhle namazwe omhlaba ngenhloso yokugcina nokuvikela uhlelo lokubambisana nokusebenzisana kwamazwe ngamazwe olusekelwe phezu kwemithetho ebekiwe, oluholwa yinhlangano yezizwe (i-un).

eng: we will use our membership of the un security council to promote the peaceful resolution of disputes, particularly on our own continent.
zul: sizosebenzisa isikhundla sethu njengelungu lomkhandlu wezokuvikela we-un, (i-unsc), ukugqugquzela imizamo yokuxazulula izingxabano ngokuthula, ikakhulukazi kwizwekazi lase-afrika bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kuhlobo lweningizimu afrika esiyifisayo, sidinga isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nokubambisana esisha.

eng: we need to forge durable partnerships between government, business, labour, communities and civil society.
zul: kudingeka ukuthi sakhe ubambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni, abasebenzi, imiphakathi kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi.

eng: this places a responsibility on each of us and all of us.
zul: lokhu kubeka umthwalo emahlombe ethu sonke.

eng: government must create an enabling environment, use public resources wisely and invest in developing the country’s human potential.
zul: uhulumeni kumele akhe isimo esifanelekile, azisebenzise ngobuhlakani izinsiza nezimali zakhe futhi atshale izimali ekuthuthukiseni abasebenzi baleli lizwe.

eng: we would like business to consider the country’s national strategic objectives and social considerations in their decisions and actions.
zul: kungaba yinto enhle impela uma abamabhizinisi bengazibhekelela izinjongo zezwe ezisemqoka kanye nezidingo zomphakathi ngenkathi bethatha izinqumo kanye nezinyathelo zabo.

eng: we agree that labour should advance the interests of workers while, at the same time, promoting the sustainability of businesses and the creation of jobs.
zul: siyavuma ukuthi izinyunyana zabasebenzi kumele zilwele amalungelo abasebenzi, futhi kusenjalo, zigqugquzele ukusimama kwamabhizinisi nokwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

eng: civil society needs to continue to play its role in holding government to account but must also join us in practical actions to attain our common goals.
zul: izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kumele ziqhubeke nokudlala indima yazo yokuqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni uyaphendula ngemisebenzi yakhe, kodwa futhi kumele zihlanganyele nathi ekuthatheni izinyathelo eziphathekayo okuhloswe ngazo ukufezekisa izinjongo zethu sonke.

eng: we look to the parties in this parliament to be a vital part of this partnership, lending support, insights and coming up with tangible solutions and efforts to promote the national interest.
zul: sinethemba lokuthi amaqembu amelwe kuleli phalamende azoba yingxenye esemqoka kulolu bambiswano, futhi alekelele, ahlinzeke ngemibono enohlonze nemiqondo ebonisa ubuhlakani obukhulu futhi aqhamuke nezixazululo kanye nemizamo ephathekayo ngenhloso yokuhlomulisa izwe lonkana.

eng: this social compact requires a contribution from everyone.
zul: lesi sivumelwano sokubambisana komphakathi wonkana sidinga ukuthi wonke umuntu afake isandla.

eng: it will also need sacrifices and trade-offs.
zul: futhi sidinga ukuzidela kanye nokuhlangabezana phakathi, ukuze kube khona ukuvumelana nokusebenzisana okuhle.

eng: it is upon the conduct of each that the fate of all depends.
zul: impumelelo yomuntu wonke incike kwindlela aziphatha ngayo omunye nomunye wethu.

eng: if we are to reinvigorate the implementation of the ndp, we must cast our sights on the broadest of horizons.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukuvuselela nokufaka ugqozi nofuqufuqu ekuqalisweni kwe-ndp, kumele siqinisekise ukuthi amehlo ethu ahlala ethe njo phambili lapho siphokophele khona.

eng: we want a south africa wherein all enjoy comfort and prosperity.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho wonke muntu ezophila kamnandi futhi ahlale ngokunethezeka, akhombe ngophakathi.

eng: but we also want a south africa where we will stretch our capacities to the fullest as we advance along the super highway of progress.
zul: kodwa-ke futhi sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho sizokwazi ukusebenzisa ngokuphelele amandla namakhono ethu ngenkathi siqhubeka endleleni ephokophele phambili.

eng: we want a south africa that has prioritised its rail networks, and is producing high-speed trains connecting our megacities and the remotest areas of our country.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika ebeke eqhulwini izinhlelo zayo zokuthutha ngesitimela futhi okuyizinhlelo ezikhiziqa izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu ezizoxhumanisa amadolobhakazi ethu nezindawo zasemakhaya ezisemajukujukwini ezwe lethu.

eng: we should imagine a country where bullet trains pass through johannesburg as they travel from here to musina, and they stop in buffalo city on their way from ethekwini back here in cape town.
zul: kumele sizibone ngamehlo engqondo sesiphila ezweni lapho izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu zidlula egoli ziphokophele e-musina, futhi lapho zifika e-buffalo city zithi ukuma kancane, zivela ethekwini, sezibuyela emuva lapha edolobheni lasekapa.

eng: we want a south africa with a high-tech economy where advances in e-health, robotics and remote medicine are applied as we roll out the nhi.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika enomnotho ogxile kubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje lapho sisebenzisa khona izindlela-kusebenza zezempilo ezihlinzekwa ngohlelo-kusebenza lwe-inthanethi, nama-robotics kanye nokwelashwa okuhlinzekwa ezigulini ezikude kwezindawo zokwelapha, ngenkathi siqalisa ukusebenza kwe-nhi.

eng: what type of south africa do we want?
zul: nhloboni yeningizimu afrika esiyifisayo?

eng: we want a south africa that doesn’t simply export its raw materials but has become a manufacturing hub for key components used in electronics, in automobiles and in computers.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika engagcini nje kuphela ngokuthumela kwamanye amazwe imikhiqizo engakalungiswa, kepha eyisizinda esisezingeni lomhlaba sokukhiqizwa kwezingxenye ezisemqoka ezisetshenziswa kuma-elekthronikhi, ezimotweni kanye nakumakhompyutha.

eng: we must be a country that can feed itself and that harnesses the latest advances in smart agriculture.
zul: kumele sibe yizwe elikwaziyo ukuzondla futhi lokhu sikwenze ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kwezolimo.

eng: i dream of a south africa where the first entirely new city built in the democratic era rises, with skyscrapers, schools, universities, hospitals and factories.
zul: kuyiphupho lami ukubona iningizimu afrika lapho kwakhiwa idolobha elisha sha esikhathini sombuso wentando yeningi labantu, elinamabhilidi amade, izikole, amanyuvesi, izibhedlela kanye namafemu.

eng: this dream that i have has been fuelled by my conversations with four wonderful people: dr nkosazana dlamini zuma, dr naledi pandor, ms jessie duarte and president xi jinping of china, whose account of how china is building a new city 100 kilometres from beijing has helped to consolidate my dream.
zul: leli phupho lami ligqugquzelwe yingxoxo engibe nayo nabantu abanohlonze abanjengodkt nkosazana dlamini-zuma, dkt naledi pandor, nkz jessie duarte kanye nomongameli wase-china u-xi jinping, owathi uma engixoxela ngokuthi i-china imatasa yakha idolobha elisha ebangeni elingamakhilomitha ayi-100 kusuka edolobheni lase-beijing, wangenza ngibone ukuthi ngempela lingafezekiseka leli phupho lami.

eng: this is a dream we can all share and participate in building.
zul: leli yiphupho okungaba ngelethu sonke futhi silifezekise ngempela.

eng: we have not built a new city in 25 years of democracy.
zul: eminyakeni eyi-25 leli lizwe libuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, asikaze sakhe idolobha elisha.

eng: seventy-five percent of south africans are going to be living in the urban areas by 2030. the cities of johannesburg, tshwane, cape town and ethekwini are running out of space to accommodate all those who throng to the cities.
zul: bangama-75% abantu baseningizimu afrika abazobe sebehlala ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni ngowezi-2030.

eng: has the time not arrived for us to be bold and reach beyond ourselves and do what may seem impossible?
zul: ingabe asikafiki yini isikhathi sokuthi sibonise isibindi futhi senze lokho ebesingacabangi neze ukuthi singaba namandla okukwenza?

eng: has the time not arrived to build a new smart city founded on the technologies of the fourth industrial revolution?
zul: ingabe akusona yini lesi isikhathi sokuthi sakhe idolobha elisha elisekelwe phezu koguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje?

eng: i would like to invite south africans to begin imaging this prospect.
zul: ngithanda ukumema abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi baqale ukubona ngamehlo ukwakhiwa kwedolobha elinjengaleli.

eng: we are the south african nation that, with its constitution, gives hope to the hopeless, rights to the dispossessed and marginalised, and comfort and security to its men, women and children.
zul: thina siyisizwe saseningizimu afrika, esikwaziyo ukuthi ngomthethosisekelo waso, sibuyise ithemba esimweni lapho belingasekho nelincane ithemba, esikwaziyo ukuhlinzeka ngamalungelo kubantu ababephucwe konke okungokwabo basala bengondinga sithebeni, futhi siyisizwe elikwaziyo ukuhlinzeka ngokunethezeka nokuvikeleka kubo bonke abantu balo, amadoda, abesifazane kanye nezingane.

eng: though we may have faltered, we have not forgotten who we are, and what we stand for.
zul: nakuba kukhona lapho sihlulekile ukwenza izinto ngendlela efanele kanye nalapho siphelelwe khona wugqozi nofuqufuqu, asikazikhohlwa ukuthi singobani futhi asikakhohlwa ukuthi simeleni.

eng: we are still that nation.
zul: siseyisona leso sizwe esishiwo ngenhla.

eng: you may ask how i can be hopeful at such a difficult time.
zul: ungazibuza ukuthi ngingaba kanjani nethemba ezikhathini ezinzima njengalezi.

eng: i am hopeful because i have walked with the people of this country – the nurses and health care workers, our men and women in uniform, the teachers in our schools, the students who despite their family’s hardship are determined to succeed, and the youth who are trying to start their own businesses, to invent and create, and to rise above their circumstances.
zul: nginethemba ngoba sengihambe ibanga elide nabantu baleli lizwe – abahlengikazi kanye nabasebenzi bezempilo, amaphoyisa namasosha, othisha ezikoleni zethu abafundi abazimisele ukuphumelela nakuba bebhekene nobunzima nenhlupheko emakhaya, kanye nentsha ezama ukuzisungulela amabhizinisi, ezama ukuqamba nokwakha izinto ezitsha, futhi eyenza konke okusemandleni ayo ukuphumelela ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima ehlangabezana nazo.

eng: it is you who give me courage, and to whom i offer courage in return.
zul: yinina-ke eninginikeza isibindi, futhi nami ngokunjalo ngininikeza isibindi.

eng: working together there is nothing we cannot be, nothing we cannot do, and nothing we cannot achieve.
zul: uma sisebenza ngokubambisana akukho okungasehlula.

eng: speaker of the national assembly (na), ms thandi modise,chairperson of the national council of provinces (ncop), mr amos masondo,deputy president david mabuza,chief justice mogoeng mogoeng and esteemed members of the judiciary,former president thabo mbeki and mrs mbeki,former president kgalema motlanthe and mrs motlanthe,former deputy president fw de klerk and mrs de klerk,former speaker ms baleka mbete and mr khomo,president of the pan african parliament, his excellency roger nkodo dang, united nations (un) south africa representative, ms anne githuku-shongwe,isithwalandwe, mr andrew mlangeni,ministers and deputy ministers,premiers and speakers of provincial legislatures,president of the south african local government association and executive mayors,governor of the south african reserve bank (sarb), mr lesetja kganyago,heads of chapter 9 institutions,leaders of faith-based organisations,leaders of academic and research institutions,members of the diplomatic corps,invited guests,honourable members of the na,honourable members of the ncop,fellow south africans,it is 30 years since nelson rolihlahla mandela walked out of the gates of victor verster prison, a moment in our history that signalled perhaps more vividly than any other that freedom was at hand.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, nks thandi modise,sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli, u-david mabuza,ijaji eliyinhloko, u-mogoeng mogoeng, kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa,umongameli waphambilini, umnu thabo mbeki nonkk mbeki,umongameli waphambilini, umnu kgalema motlanthe nonkk motlanthe,iphini likamongameli laphambilini u-fw de klerk no nkk de klerk,somlomo waphambilini unks baleka mbete nomnu khomo,umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umnu roger nkodo dang, omele abesifazane baseningizimu afrika kunhlangano yezizwe, nks anne githuku-shongwe,isithwalandwe, umnu andrew mlangeni,ongqongqoshe kanye namaphini abo,ondunankulu kanye nosomlomo bezishayamthetho zezifundazwe,umongameli wenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya yaseningizimu afrika kanye nezimeya zemikhandludolobha,umphathi webhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika, umnu lesetja kganyago,izinhloko zezikhungo zikahulumeni ezeseka ukubusa ngentando yeningi labantu,abaholi bezinhlangano zezenkolo,abaholi bezikhungo zezemfundo nezocwaningo,amalungu ezindlu zamanxusa,izimenywa ezikhethekile,amalungu ahloniphekile esigungu sikazwelonke,amalungu ahloniphekile omkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,bantu baseningizimu afrika,ndi tama u lumelisa vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha vha fhano na hayani.

eng: as we gather to reflect on the state of our nation, we are joined by the family of basil february, a courageous young freedom fighter who lost his life in zimbabwe in the wankie campaign of 1967. for half a century, his resting place, like those of several of his comrades, has, until now, remained unknown.
zul: sekuyiminyaka engama-30 selokhu u-nelson rolihlala mandela akhululwa ejele i-victor verster, okungumzuzu emlandweni wethu ogqame kakhulu kuneminye inkululeko eke yaba nawo njengamanje.

eng: through the jobs summit, we brought labour, business, government and communities together to find solutions to the unemployment crisis, and we continue to meet at the beginning of every month, the deputy president and myself, to remove blockages and drive interventions that will save and create jobs.
zul: amandla amakhulu entando yeningi labantu yomthethosisekelo wethu, nesizathu esenza ubekezelelwe, ingenxa yokuthi sikwazile ukuqhubela phambili imifelandawonye esabalele nezivumelwano zomphakathi, kungaba namabhizinisi, abasebenzi, abantu abanentshisekelo efanayo noma umphakathi jikelele.

eng: we have come together, as government and civil society, as communities and faith-based groupings, to confront the violence that is perpetrated by men against women.
zul: ukufika esivumelwaneni nokwakha izivumelwano zomphakathi akukona ukutshengisa ubuthaka.

eng: together, over these last two years, we have worked to stabilise our economy and build a foundation for growth.
zul: yingakho eminyakeni emibili edlule besisebenza kanzima sifuna ukuqhubela phambili futhi sakhe isivumelwano ngohlelo lwethu lokutakula umnotho.

eng: through these immediate measures and the work underway to fundamentally restructure our electricity industry, we will achieve a secure supply of reliable, affordable and, ultimately, sustainable energy.
zul: iqiniso okuzomele silamukele ukuthi ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukulungisa okubalulekile okudingekayo ukwenza ngcono ukuthembeka kokuthunyelwa kogesi, ukucishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuzohlala kuyinto engenzeka esikhathini esizayo.

eng: we undertake this decisive shift in our energy trajectory at a time when humankind faces its greatest existential threat in the form of climate change.
zul: lapho ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kungenakugwenywa, kumele sikuthathe ngendlela engaqageleka futhi kunciphise ukuphazamiseka nezindleko ezimbonini nasemakhaya.

eng: yesterday, i met ayakha melithafa, a young climate activist from eerste rivier who attended the world economic forum in davos this year to call on world leaders to stand firmly for climate justice.
zul: ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, njengoba u-eskom usebenza ukubuyisa amakhona akhe okusebenza, sizobe sisebenzisa izindlela ezizoguqula ngendlela ebaluleke kakhulu umgudu wokuphehlwa kogesi ezweni lethu.

eng: we will finalise the climate change bill, which provides a regulatory framework for the effective management of inevitable climate change impacts by enhancing adaptive capacity, strengthening resilience and reducing vulnerability to climate change – and identifying new industrial opportunities in the green economy.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuncishiswa okukhulu ezindlekweni - kubandakanya nokubuyekezwa kwezivumelwano zokusebenza ezingalandeli umthetho - nezindlela zokuhlanganisa izinsiza ezizonciphisa isikweletu sika-eskom bese zifaka imali lapho kudingeka khona.

eng: by working with the auditor-general to reduce irregular expenditure, by shifting government spending from consumption expenditure to investment in infrastructure, we aim to improve the state of public finances.
zul: sizoqedela umthethosivivinywa wokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, onikeza uhlaka lwezimiso zokuphathwa ngendlela kwemithelela yokuguquka kwesimo sezulu okungenakugwenywa ngokuthuthukisa ukumelana nokuguquka kwesimo sezulu, kuqiniswe ukuzilungiselela nokulindela ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu kanye nokunciphisa ukuba buthakathaka ngenxa yokuguquka kwesimo sezulu - nokuthola amathuba ezimboni amasha emnothweni onciphisa ubungozi kwezemvelo.

eng: this year, we will be introducing coding and robotics in grades r to 3 in 200 schools, with a plan to implement it fully by 2022. we have decided to establish a new university of science and innovation in ekurhuleni.
zul: sakha amakolishi amakhono nobuchwepheshe ayi-9 kulonyaka, e-sterkspruit, e-aliwal north, e-graaff reinet nasengqungqushe empumalanga kapa, kanye nase-umzikhulu, e-greytown, emsinga, kwanongoma nakwagqikazi kwazulu-natali.

eng: the infrastructure fund implementation team has finalised the list of shovel-ready projects and has begun work to expand private investment into public infrastructure sectors with revenue streams.
zul: ngakho-ke siyawamukela umsebenzi wokubambisana kukahulumani nezinhlangano zomphakathi begqugquzelwa ngokusungula isu likazwelonke lokulwa nenkohlakalo nohlelo lokuqala ukusebenza, osekuseduze ukuthi kuphele kulesigaba somsebenzi.

eng: this will allow them to receive active support, information and work readiness training to increase their employability and match themselves to opportunities.
zul: isixazululo kulolu sizi kumele lube mbaxambili - kumele sakhele abantu abasha amathuba emisebenzi kanye nokuziqasha bona.

eng: starting this month, we are launching five prototype sites in five provinces that will grow to a national network reaching three million young people through multiple channels.
zul: ekusebenzeni kwabantu abashu, ukusuka namuhla, siqala ukusebensiza uhlelo lukamongameli lokungenelela ukusebenza kwabantu abasha - izinto eziyisithupha eziseqhulwini eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo ukunciphisa ukungasebenzi kwabantu abasha.

eng: this will allow them to receive active support, information and work readiness training to increase their employability and match themselves to opportunities.
zul: lokhu kuzobavumela ukuthola ukwesekwa, ulwazi kanye nokuqeqeshelwa ukulungela umsebenzi ukukhuphula ukuqasheka kwabo nokuzifaka emathubeni.

eng: secondly, we are fundamentally changing how we prepare young people for the future of work, providing shorter, more flexible courses in specific skills that employers in fast-growing sectors need.
zul: ukusuka kule nyanga, sethula izindawo ezihlanu zokuthumela imiyalezo ezifundazweni ezinhlanu ezizokhulisa inethiwekhi yezwe ukufinyelela ezigidini ezintathu zabantu abasha ngemigubu eyahlukene.

eng: thirdly, we are developing new and innovative ways to support youth entrepreneurship and self-employment.
zul: lokhu kuzobavumela ukuthola ukwesekwa, ulwazi kanye nokuqeqeshelwa ukulungela umsebenzi ukuphuphula ukuqasheka kwabo nokuzifaka emathubeni.

eng: fourthly, we are scaling up the youth employment service and working with tvet colleges and the private sector to ensure that more learners receive practical experience in the workplace to complete their training.
zul: okwesibili, siguqula indlela esilungiselela ngayo abantu abasha ingomuso lomsebenzi, sibahlinzeka ngezinhlelo zezifundo ezimfisha, nezihambelana nezimo emakhonweni athize adingwa ngabaqashi emikhakheni ekhulayo ngesivinini.

eng: fifthly, we are establishing the first cohort of a presidential youth service programme that will unlock the agency of young people and provide opportunities for them to earn an income while contributing to nation building.
zul: okwesithathu, sithuthukisa izindlela ezintsha ukweseka ukuvulwa kwamabhizinisi nokuziqaska kwabantu abasha.

eng: finally, we will lead a youth employment initiative which will be funded by setting aside 1% of the budget to deal with the high levels of youth unemployment.
zul: okwesihlanu, sisungula iqembu lokuqala lohlelo lukamongameli losizo lwentsha oluzovula ukungenelela kwabantu abasha futhi lubanikeze amathuba ukuze nabo bathole inzuzo ngesikhathi benikela ekwakheni isizwe.

eng: this will be through top slicing from the budget, which will require that we all tighten our belts and redirect resources to address the national crisis of youth unemployment.
zul: okokugcina, sizohola igxathu lokuqashwa kwabantu abasha oluzoxhaswa ngokubeka eceleni isamba esiyi-1% lesabelomali ukuze sisetshenziswe ukubhekana namazinga aphezulu okungasebenzi kwabantu abasha.

eng: the minister of finance will prioritise this initiative and give specific details when he delivers the medium-term budget policy statement later this year.
zul: lokhu kuzokwenzeka ngokugebhula kusabelomali, okuzodinga ukuthi sonke sizibambe ziqine bese sibhekisa kabusha izinsiza ukuhlangabezana nosizi lukazwelonke lokungasebenzi kwentsha.

eng: these six actions will together ensure that every young person in this country has a place to go, that their energy and capabilities are harnessed, and that they can contribute to the growth of their communities and their country.
zul: lezi zenzo zizonke zizoqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu omusha kuleli zwe onendawo angaya kuyo, ukuthi amandla namakhono abo ayasetshenziswa, nokuthi bangakwazi ukulekelela ukufaka isandla ekukhuliseni imiphakathi yabo kanye nezwe labo.

eng: as part of this intervention, the national youth development agency and the department of small business development will provide grant funding and business support to 1.000 young entrepreneurs in the next 100 days – starting tomorrow.
zul: njengengxenye yokungenelela, inhlangano kazwelonke ethuthukisa intsha kanye nomnyango wokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinsi amancane uzonikezela ngoxhasomali kanye nokulekelwa kwamabhizinisi kosomabhizinisi abancane abayi-1000 ezinsukwini eziyi-100 ezilandelayo- kusuka kusasa.

eng: we have invited three of these young entrepreneurs to join us here this evening: siyabonga tiwana, sibusiso mahone and tholakele nkosi.
zul: simeme abathathu balabo somabhizinisi abancane ukuthi bahlanganyele nathi kusihlwa: usiyabonga tiwana, usibusiso mahone kanye notholakele nkosi.

eng: they and others like them prove that, given the necessary support, young people can create their own opportunities.
zul: bona kanye nabanye abafana nabo batshengisa ukuthi, uma benganikwa ukwesekwa okudingekayo, abantu abasha bangazidalela amathuba ngokwabo.

eng: these three young entrepreneurs form part of a larger and more ambitious programme to assist 100.000 young entrepreneurs over the next three years to access business skills training, funding and market facilitation.
zul: labo somabhizinisi abathathu abancane bayingxenye yohlelo olukhulu olunezifiso zokusiza osomabhizinisi abancane bayi-100 000 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo ukuthola ukuqeqeshwa ngamakhono amabhizinisi, uxhasomali kanye nokubheka ezentengiso.

eng: the empowerment of women is critical to inclusive economic growth.
zul: ukuthuthukiswa kwabesifazane kubucayi ekukhukisweni komnotho obandakayo wonke umuntu.

eng: we are introducing the shetradesza platform to assist women-owned businesses to participate in global value chains and markets.
zul: sethula indlela yokusebenza ebizwa nge-shetradesza ukusiza amabhizinisi aphethwe ngabesifazane ukuthi lungene ezitolo eziluxhaxha emhlabeni jikelele kanye nasezimakethe.

eng: over the next five years, the industrial development corporation is targeting r10 billion of own and partner funding for women-empowered businesses.
zul: eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo, inhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni izibekele izigidigidi eziyi-10 zamarandi zoxhasomali lwayo kanye nolalaba esebenzisana nabo zamabhizinisi aphethwe abesifazane.

eng: to create a larger market for small businesses, we plan to designate 1.000 locally produced products that must be procured from small, medium and micro entreprises.
zul: ukuvulela amabhizinisi amancane imakethe enkulu, sihlela ukuqoka imikhiqizo ekhiqizwa lapha ekhaya okumele ithengwe kumabhizinisi amancane (smmes).

eng: the procurement bill will soon be presented to parliament as part of our efforts to empower black and emerging businesses and advance radical economic transformation.
zul: umthethosivivinywa wokuthenga uzokwethulwa ephalamende maduze njengengxenye yemizamo yethu yokuthuthukisa amabhizinsi abansundu nasafufusa nokuguquka okukhulu kwezomnotho.

eng: this year, we intensify our investment drive with the establishment of an integrated investment promotion and facilitation capability coordinated from the presidency.
zul: kulonyaka siqinisa umkhankaso wethu wotshalomali ngokusungula ukukhangiswa kotshalomali oluhlanganisiwe nokubheka ukuqhutshwa kwaloluhlelo oluxhunyaniswe ihhovisi likamongameli.

eng: we will hold our third south africa investment conference in november to review the implementation of previous commitments and to generate new investment into our economy.
zul: sizobamba ingqungquthela yotshalomali eningizimu afrika ngolwezi ukubuyekeza ukuqala kokusetshenzwa kwezibophezelo ezedlule nokuza notshalomali olusha emnothweni wethu.

eng: at the second south africa investment conference last year, over 70 companies made investment commitments of r364 billion in industries as diverse as advanced manufacturing, agro-processing, infrastructure, mining, services, tourism and hospitality.
zul: engqungqutheleni yotshalomali lwaseningizimu afrika yesibili ngonyaka odlule, zingaphezu kwama-70 izinkampani ezazibophezela kutshalomali lwezigidigidi eningama-364 zamaradi ezimbonini olwehluke njengokukhiqiza okusezingeni eliphezulu, ezolimo, izingqalasizinda, ezezimayini, izinsizakalo, ezokuvakasha nokuphathwa kwezivakashi.

eng: in the first two years of our ambitious investment drive, we have raised a total of r664 billion in investment commitments, which is more than half of our five-year target of r1.2 trillion.
zul: eminyakeni emibili yokuqala womkhankaso wethu wotshalomali, sesiqoqe isamba sezigidigidi ezingama-664 zamarandi ezibophezelweni zotshalomali, okungaphezu kohhafu kwesizibekele khona eminyakeni emihlanu okuyitriliyoni eli-1.2 lamarandi.

eng: more importantly, these investments are having a real impact.
zul: okubaluleke kakhulu, lolu tshalomali lunomthelela wangempela.

eng: already, projects with an investment value of r9 billion have been completed and 27 projects worth just over r250 billion are in implementation phases, with more coming on-stream this year.
zul: njengamanje, imisebenzi yesamba sotshalomali sezigidigidi eziyi-9 zamarandi isiphothuliwe nemisebenzi engama-27 ebiza ngaphezu kwezigidigidi ezingama-250 zamarandi izoqalwa, neminye eminingi ezayo kulonyaka.

eng: i have visited newly-built factories that make smartphones, and plants expanded to produce more cars, and walked through the dust on construction sites at supplier parks.
zul: ngivakashele izimboni ezisanda kwakhiwa ezenza omakhalekhukhwini, kanye nezindawo zokukhiqiza ezinwebiwe ukukhiqiza izimoto ezithe xaxa, ngihambe othulwini ezindaweni lapho kusetshenzwa khona kubaphakeli bemikhiqizo.

eng: we have been to the opening of facilities producing goods ranging from power cables to sanitary products, from tyres to food.
zul: sesihambele imicimbi yokuvulwa kwezindawo ezikhiqiza izimpahla kusuka ezintanjeni zikagesi kuya emikhiqizweni yenhlanzeko, kusuka emathayini kuya ekudleni.

eng: we have made important progress in finalising and implementing master plans in vital parts of our economy.
zul: sesenze inqubekela phambili ebalulekile ekuphothuleni nokuqalisa ukusebenza kwamasu ezingxenyeni ezibalulekile zomnotho wethu.

eng: these master plans bring government, labour and business together to develop practical measures to spur growth at sector level and each partner contributes to making it work.
zul: lamasu amakhulu aletha uhulumeni, abasebenzi namabhizinisi ndawonye ukuthuthukisa izindlela zokukhula ezingeni labo futhi ngabanye ngabanye bafaka isandla ekwenzeni ukuthi kusebenzeke.

eng: thanks in large measure to the auto master plan, we sold more cars to the rest of the world last year than ever before, providing jobs for young people in eastern cape and kwazulu-natal.
zul: siyabonga kakhulu ohlelweni lwe-auto master plan, sidayise izimoto eziningi emhlabeni ngonyaka odlule ukudlula ngaphambilini, okunikeze imisebenzi kubantu abasha empumalanga koloni nakwazulu natali.

eng: we launched a new auto special economic zone hub in tshwane, which will expand production and local manufacture of components.
zul: sethule indawo entsha ye-sez e-tshwane, ezokwandisa ukukhiqizwa nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo yalapha ekhaya.

eng: the clothing and textiles master plan, which was signed last year, aims to create 121.000 new jobs in the retail-clothing textile and footwear sector over the decade.
zul: uhlelo lwemboni yezingubo nendwangu, olwasayindwa ngonyaka odlule, luhlose ukudala imisebenzi emisha eyi-121 000 embonini yezendwangu kanye nasemkhakheni wezicathulo eminyakeni elishumi.

eng: it involves commitments by retailers to buy goods locally, by manufacturers to invest and support transformation, and by labour to develop bargaining structures that promote agile manufacturing.
zul: kubandakanya ukuzibophezela kwabadayisi ukuthenga izimpahla zalapha ekhaya, ngabakhiqizi ukutshala izimali nokweseka uguquko, nabasebenzi ukusungula uhlaka lokuxoxisana oluzothuthukisa ukukhiqizwa ngokushesha.

eng: for its part, government has already begun to act vigorously against illegal imports, seizing almost 400 containers with under-invoiced products in the last quarter of 2019. this suit that i am wearing today, like last year, was proudly made by south african workers.
