eng: this approach is being piloted in schools in the northern cape and eastern cape.
zul: indlela entsha yokusebenza izokwethula isithuthi somsebenzi okhethekile, ngokusebenzisana nezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezezimali nomkhakha ozimele, ukuhambisa ingqalasizinda yezemfundo.

eng: over the past year, government has built on its successful hydrogen sa strategy to make major strides in positioning south africa as a global leader in this new market.
zul: onyakeni owedlule, uhulumeni sewakhe kwiqhingasu elibeyimpumelele le-hydrogen sa ukuthatha amagxathu abanzi ukubeka iningizimu afrika ukuthi ihambe phambili emhlabeni kule makethe entsha.

eng: this includes the development of a hydrogen society roadmap for the next 10 years as well as a green hydrogen strategy for the northern cape, supporting the development of a green hydrogen pipeline worth around r270 billion.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukuthuthukiswa komhlahlandlela i-hydrogen society roadmap weminyaka elishumi ezayo kanjalo neqhingasu i-green hydrgen strategy lasenyakatho kapa, ukweseka ukuthuthukiswa komsebenzi wokusebenzisa ihayidrojini engangcolisi umoya oqhubekayo wenani elilinganiselwa kwizigidigidi ezingama-r270.

eng: the damage caused by the theft of scrap metal and cable on our infrastructure like electricity, trains and other vital services is enormous.
zul: umonakalo odalwe ukwebiwa kwensimbi nezintambo kwingqalasizinda yethu efana nogesi, izitimela kanye nezinye izinsiza ezibalulekile mukhulu kakhulu.

eng: we will take decisive steps this year both through improved law enforcement and by considering further measures to address the sale or export of such scrap metal.
zul: sizothatha izinyathelo zokuthatha izinqumo kulo nyaka ngokulandela umthetho nangokucabanga ngezinye izinyathelo ukubhekana nokudayiswa noma ukuthunyelwa kwamanye amazwe kwalezi zinsimbi.

eng: an important pillar of our errp is to revitalise our manufacturing base and create globally competitive export industries.
zul: insika ebalulekile ye-errp yethu ukuvuselela isisekelo sokukhiqiza nokusungula izimboni ezithumela impahla kwamanye amazwe ezisezingeni lokuncintisana emhlabeni.

eng: in the past year, we launched new master plans in the steel industry, furniture and global business services.
zul: enyakeni owedlule, sethula izinhlelo ezintsha embonini yensimbi, impahla yasendlini nezinsiza zebhizinisi emhlabeni.

eng: through these plans, business, government and labour are working together to increase production and create more jobs in the sector.
zul: ngalezi zinhlelo, amabhizinisi, uhulumeni kanye nezabasebenzi basebenza ngokubambisana ukwenyusa ukukhiqiza nokusungula imisebenzi eminingi kulo mkhakha.

eng: in the clothing industry, a number of retailers have announced ambitious localisation sourcing plans.
zul: embonini yezimpahla zokugqoka, izitolo eziningi sezimemezele isifiso sezinhlelo zokusebenzisa imikhiqizo yalapha ekhaya.

eng: one of these retailers, foschini, kindly made the suit that i am wearing today at its new formal wear factory, prestige epping.
zul: esinye salezi zitolo, i-foschini, eyenze isudi engiyigqoke namuhla efemini yabo entsha yezingubo zasehhovisi, i-prestige epping.

eng: five years ago, more than 80% of all foschini group merchandise came from the east.
zul: eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule, angaphezu kwama-80% ezimpahla zase-foschini group bezivela ngasempumalanga.

eng: today, nearly half of the merchandise is locally made.
zul: namuhla, cishe uhhafu wezimpahla zikhiqizwe lapha ekhaya.

eng: the genuine leather shoes i am wearing were made by members of the national union of leather and allied workers from bolton footwear in cape town and dick whittington shoes in pietermaritzburg.
zul: izicathulo zesikhumba engizigqokile zenziwe ngamalungu e-national union of leather and allied workers abaphuma e-bolton footwear ekapa kanye nase-dick whittington shoes emgungundlovu.

eng: nearly four years ago, we set ourselves a target of mobilising r1.2 trillion in new investment over five years.
zul: cishe eminyakeni emine eyedlule, sazibekela ukuthi sizonxenxa utshalomali olusha lwe-r1.2 trillion eminyakeni emihlanu.

eng: by the time of the third south africa investment conference in november 2020, we had reached r776 billion in investment commitments.
zul: ngesikhathi sengqungquthela yesithathu yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika ngolwezi ngowezi-2020, sabe sifikelele kwizigidigidi ezingama-r776 kwizithembiso zotshalomali.

eng: next month, on the 24th of march, we will be holding the fourth south africa investment conference in johannesburg.
zul: ngenyanga ezayo, mhla zingama-24 kundasa, sizosingatha ingqungquthela yotshalomali eningizimu afrika yesine egoli.

eng: we will showcase the many investment opportunities available as south africa continues its recovery from the covid-19 pandemic, and report back on the progress of previous commitments.
zul: sizobe sibonisa amathuba amaningi otshalomali akhona njengoba iningizimu afrika iqhubeka nokululama kubhubhane lwe-covid-19, kanye nokubika ngenqubekela-phambili ezethembisweni ezazenziwe phambilini.

eng: following the resolutions of the african union summit over the past weekend, trading can now begin under the african continental free trade area agreementsouth african companies are poised to play a key role in taking up the opportunities that this presents for preferential access to other african markets.
zul: ngokulandela izinqumo zengqungquthela yobumbano lwamazwe ase-afrika ngempelasonto eyedlule, ukuhweba selungaqala ngaphansi kwesivumelwano sokuhwebelana ngokukhululekile kwamazwe ase-afrika.

eng: the free trade agreement is about africa taking charge of its destiny and growing its economies faster.
zul: izinkampani zaseningizimu afrika zimele ukudlala indima ebalulekile ekuthatheni amathuba alethwa yilokhu ukuze zizokwazi ukufinyelela kwezinye izimakethe ezwenikazi lase-afrika.

eng: we will continue to pursue africa’s health sovereignty, working with other african countries and international partners to support the strengthening of the continent’s capacity to respond to pandemics.
zul: isivumelwano sokuhwebelana ngaphandle kokukhokha intela simayelana ne-afrika ukuthi ithathe izintambo ngekusasa layo kanye nokukhulisa umnotho wayo ngokushesha.

eng: we will increase our efforts to develop africa’s ability to manufacture vaccines.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokuphokophelela amandla ezempilo e-afrika, sisebenzisana namanye amazwe ase-afrika nozakwethu emhlabeni jikelele ukweseka ukuqiniswa kwekhono lezwekazi ukubhekana nobhubhane.

eng: we have made significant progress here in south africa.
zul: sesenze inqubekela-phambili ebonakalayo lapha eningizimu afrika.

eng: we now have two south african companies – aspen and biovac – with contracts to produce covid-19 vaccines.
zul: manje sesinezinkampani ezimbili zalapha eningizimu afrika – i-aspen ne-biovac – ezinezinkontileka zokukhiqiza imigomo ye-covid-19.

eng: two additional vaccine projects have also been announced.
zul: eminye imiklamo emibili yokwengeza nayo isimenyezelwe.

eng: in addition, we have full local production capability for ventilators, hand sanitisers, medical-grade face masks and gloves and therapeutic drugs and anaesthetics.
zul: ngaphezu kwalokhu, sinendawo yokukhiqiza ngokugcwele imishini esiza ngokuphefumula, izibulali-magciwane zezandla, izifonyo zokwelapha namagilavu kanye nemithi yokwelapha kanye nemithi ebulala izinzwa.

eng: this production capability worth many billions of rand of production annually, has been put in place in less than two years.
zul: le ndawo yokukhiqiza ebiza izigidigidi zamarandi zokukhiqiza ngonyaka, yakhiwe esikhathini esingaphansi kweminyaka emibili.

eng: south african products have been exported to other african countries, securing them vital supplies and expanding jobs for young south africans.
zul: imikhiqizo yaseningizimu afrika ithunyelwe kwamanye amazwe ase-afrika, bathola izinsiza ezibalulekile nathi sakhulisa imisebenzi entsheni yaseningizimu afrika.

eng: while we help existing industries to grow, we are also nurturing new opportunities for growth and jobs.
zul: ngesikhathi sisiza izimboni ezikhona ukuthi zikhule, siphinde sibumbe amathuba amasha okukhula nemisebenzi.

eng: government and the private sector have worked closely together to grow the global business services sector from a small group of companies to one of the world’s leading players.
zul: uhulumeni kanye nomkhakha ozimele basebenze ngokubambisana ukukhulisa umkhakha wezamabhizinisi emhlabeni kusuka kwiqembu lezinkampani ezincane kuya ezinkampanini ezinkulu ezihamba phambili emhlabeni.

eng: the global business services sector is on track to create 500 000 new jobs over the next few years.
zul: umkhakha wezinsiza zamabhizinisi emhlabeni uhamba ngendlela ukusungula imisebenzi emisha eyizi-500 000 eminyakeni embalwa ezayo.

eng: the hemp and cannabis sector has the potential to create more than 130 000 new jobs.
zul: umkhakha wensangu ungaba namandla okusungula imisebenzi emisha engaphezu kwezi-130 000. ngakho-ke sihlela izinqubo zokulawula ukuze umkhakha wensangu ungadlondlobala njengoba wenza kwamanye amazwe afana ne-lesotho.

eng: our people in the eastern cape, kwazulu-natal and elsewhere are ready to farm with this age-old commodity and bring it to market in new and innovative forms.
zul: abantu bakithi empumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natali kanye nanoma ikuphi bame ngomumo ukulima lo mkhiqizo wasemandulo bawulethe emakethe ngezindlela ezintsha eziqanjwe kabusha.

eng: the social economy, including early childhood development, nursing, social work and community services, has significant potential not only to create jobs, but to provide vital services that communities need.
zul: umnotho wezenhlalo, kubandakanya nokuthuthukiswa kokukhula kwabantwana, ubuhlengikazi, ubusonhlalakahle kanye nezinsiza zomphakathi, zinamandla hhayi nje kuphela okusungula imisebenzi, kodwa wokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezibaluleke kakhulu ezidingwa ngumphakathi.

eng: some of the country’s mature industries also have a lot to offer in revamping the industrial and manufacturing potential of our country.
zul: ezinye zezimboni esezimnkantsh’ ubomvu kuleli lizwe nazo kukhulu ezingakuletha ekuvuseleleni amandla ezimboni nokukhiqiza ezweni lethu.

eng: the agriculture sector has significant potential for job creation in crops such as citrus, table and dried grapes, subtropical fruit, avocadoes, berries and nuts.
zul: umkhakha wezolimo unamandla abonakalayo ekusungulweni kwemisebenzi ezitshalweni ezifana nezithelo ze-citrus, amagilebhisi, izithelo ezi-subtropical, ukotapheya, ama-berries namantongomane.

eng: masterplans in the sugar and poultry industries are contributing significantly to increased investment, improved production and transformation.
zul: izinhlelo ezinkulu embonini kashukela neyezinkukhu zinegalelo elibonakalayo ekukhuleni kotshalomali, ekuthuthukeni kwemikhiqizo kanye noguquko.

eng: to attract investors into the mining minerals needed in the new global economy, we will soon be finalising our mining exploration strategy.
zul: ukuheha abatshalizimali kwizimbiwa zasezimayini ezidingeka kumnotho omusha womhlaba, maduze sizophothula iqhingasu lokuhlola ezezimayini.

eng: we will continue to support the development of the upstream gas industry, as it holds huge potential for job creation and broader economic development.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokweseka ukuthuthukiswa kwemboni yokukhiqizwa kwegesi, njengoba inamandla amakhulu okusungula amathuba emisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kabanzi komnotho.

eng: we will ensure that this is done in strict accordance with the environmental and other laws of our country, and that where there are differences, we work together to resolve them in the interest of our country and its people.
zul: sizoqinisekisa ukuthi lokhu kwenziwa ngokulandela imithetho yezemvelo neminye imithetho yaleli lizwe, nokuthi lapho kukhona ukungaboni ngaso linye, sisebenze ngokubambisana ukusombulula izinkinga ukuze kuzozuza izwe lethu nabantu balo.

eng: we live in one of the regions of the world that is most affected by climate change.
zul: sihlala kwesinye sezifunda emhlabeni esithinteke kakhulu ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

eng: we frequently experience droughts, floods and other extreme weather events associated with global warming.
zul: sihlala njalo sibhekene nesomiso, izikhukhula kanye nezinye izimo zezulu ezihambisana nokushisa kakhulu komhlaba.

eng: recently floods have affected a number of provinces, including kwazulu-natal, gauteng and the eastern cape.
zul: kamuva-nje izikhukhula zikhahlameze izifundazwe eziningi, kubalwa nekwazulu-natali, i-gauteng kanye nempumalanga kapa.

eng: these have already caused enormous damage to infrastructure and livelihoods.
zul: lokhu sekuvele kudale umonakalo omkhulu kakhulu kwingqalasizinda kanye nendlela yokuziphilisa yabantu.

eng: in the last year, we have made important strides in the fight against climate change, and, at the same time, securing our economic competitiveness.
zul: onyakeni owedlule, sithathe amagxathu abalulekile ekulweni nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, futhi ngaleso sikhathi, sivikela ukuncintisana komnotho wethu.

eng: for the first time, our climate targets are compatible with limiting warming to 1.5°c.
zul: okokuqala ngqa, amazinga esimo sezulu esizibekele wona ahambisana nomkhawulo wokushisa ongu-1.5°c.

eng: this is the goal that all countries agreed to as part of the paris climate agreement, and is essential to prevent the worst effects of climate change.
zul: lona ngumkhawulo wonke amazwe awuvuma njengengxenye yesivumelwano i-paris climate agreement, futhi kubalulekile ukugwema imithelela emibi edalwa ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

eng: since i established the presidential climate commission a little more than a year ago, it has done much work to support a just transition to a sustainable, inclusive, resilient and low-carbon economy.
zul: selokhu ngasungula ikhomishana kamongameli yesimo sezulu ngaphezudlwana nje konyaka owedlule, isiyenze umsebenzi omkhulu ukweseka ukushintshela kalula emnothweni osimeme, obandakanya wonke umuntu, onamandla futhi onekhabhoni encane.

eng: at the international climate conference in glasgow last november, south africa struck a historic r131 billion deal with the european union, france, germany, united kingdom and the united states.
zul: engqungqutheleni yomhlaba yesimo sezulu eyayibanjwe e-glasgow ngolwezi ngonyaka owedlule, iningizimu afrika yaqopha umlando ngokwenza isivumelwano sezigidigidi eziyi-r131 ne-european union, i-france, ijalimani, i-united kingdom kanye nemelika.

eng: this first-of-its-kind partnership will involve repurposing and repowering some of the coal plants that are reaching the end of their lives, and creating new livelihoods for workers and communities most impacted by this change.
zul: lokhu kusebenzisana okuyingqayizivele kuzofaka phakathi ukusebenzisa kabusha nokuphinde kunikwe amandla ezinye zeziphehlimandla zamalahle esezizophelelwa isikhathi, nokusungula izindlela ezintsha zokuziphilisa zabasebenzi nemiphakathi ethinteke kakhulu yilolu shintsho.

eng: to ensure that south africa is able to derive the full benefit of this and other partnerships, i have appointed mr daniel mminele, a former deputy governor of the reserve bank, as head of the presidential climate finance task team to lead the mobilisation of funds for our just transition.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iningizimu afrika iyakwazi ukuzuza ngokugcwele kulokhu nokunye ukusebenzisana, ngibeke umnu daniel mminele, owayeyiphini likandunankulu webhangengodla, njengenhloko yethimba likamongameli lezimali zesimo sezulu ukuthi ahole ukunxenxwa kwezimali ukuze kuzoba noshintsho olulula.

eng: properly managed, the energy transition will benefit all.
zul: ngokulawulwa ngendlela efanele, uguquko kwezamandla luzozuzisa thina sonke.

eng: renewable energy production will make electricity cheaper and more dependable, and will allow our industries to remain globally competitive.
zul: ukukhiqizwa kwamandla avuselelekayo kuzokwenza ukuthi ugesi ungabizi futhi siwuthembe, uzobuye uvumele izimboni ukuthi zihlale zisezingeni lomhlaba lokuncintisana.

eng: investments in electric vehicles and hydrogen will equip south africa to meet the global clean energy future.
zul: utshalomali ezimotweni ezisebenza ngogesi kanye ne-hydrogen kuzocijisa iningizimu afrika ukuthi imelane nekusasa lomhlaba elinezamandla ezingangcolisi umoya.

eng: we will be able to expand our mining industry in strategic minerals that are crucial for clean energy, like platinum, vanadium, cobalt, copper, manganese and lithium.
zul: sizokwazi ukunweba imboni yezimayini kwezezimbiwa ezibalulekile kwezamandla ezingangcolisi umoya, njenge-platinum, i-vanadium, i-cobalt, ikhopha, umanyazini kanye ne-lithium.

eng: we also have a unique opportunity in green hydrogen, given our world-class solar and wind resources and local technology and expertise.
zul: siphinde sibe nethuba elingavamile ku-hydrogen engangcolisi umoya, ngokubuka izinsiza zethu ezisezingeni lomhlaba zokudonsa ugesi elangeni nasemoyeni kanye nobuchwepheshe nobungoti balapha ekhaya.

eng: all of these measures – from structural reforms to support for smmes, investments in infrastructure and the emergence of new sectors – will drive a turnaround in economic growth driven by the private sector growth over the coming years.
zul: zonke lezi zinyathelo – kusuka ekuguqulweni kwezakhiwo kuya ekwesekweni kwama-smme, ukutshalwa kwezimali kwingqalasizinda kanye nokuqhamuka kwemikhakha emisha – kuzosisa ekukhuleni komnotho okuholwa ngukukhula komkhakha ozimele eminyakeni ezayo.

eng: we know, however, that even with the best business environment and much faster rates of economic growth, it will take time for the private sector to create enough jobs for the millions of south africans who need them.
zul: noma kunjalo, siyazi ukuthi nanoma kunesimondawo esihle samabhizinisi kanye namazinga okukhula komnotho asheshayo, kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi umkhakha ozimele usungulele abantu baseningizimu afrika imisebenzi eyanele abayidingayo.

eng: our intent is to leave no one behind.
zul: inhloso yethu ukungashiyi muntu ngemuva.

eng: that is why we are expanding public and social employment.
zul: yingakho sikhulisa ukuqashwa kwabantu kuhulumeni nasemiphakathini.

eng: the first two phases of the presidential employment stimulus programmes, which we launched in october 2020 have supported over 850 000 opportunities.
zul: izigaba zokuqala ezimbili zohlelo lukamongameli lokusungulwa kwemisebenzi, ezethulwa ngomfumfu kowezi-2020 selweseke amathuba angaphezu kwezi-850 000. amaphesenti angaphezu kwangama-80 ababambiqhaza bekungabantu abasha, futhi abangaphezu kwama-60% bekungabesifazane.

eng: it has supported young women like tracy nkosi from springs, who was employed as an education assistant at welgedag primary school, and who says this opportunity has motivated her to further her studies in the educational sphere.
zul: lolu hlelo selweseke abesifazane abasebasha abafana no-tracy nkosi wase-springs, owayeqashwe njengomsizi kathisha wesikole samabanga aphansi i-welgedag primary school, futhi othi leli thuba limgqugquzele ukuthi aqhube izifundo zakhe emkhakheni wezemfundo.

eng: it has also supported mama nosipho cekwana from impendle in kwazulu-natal who used her farming input voucher to buy maize, manure and supplements for her livestock.
zul: luphinde lweseka umama nosipho cekwana wasempendle kwazulu-natali owasebenzisa ivawusha yakhe yezolimo ukuthengela imfuyo yakhe ummbila, umanyolo kanye nezakhamzimba.

eng: the total number of direct beneficiaries will soon rise to over one million south africans.
zul: inani eliphelele labazuza ngqo maduze-nje lizokhuphuka lifinyelele kwisigidi esisodwa sabantu baseningizimu afrika.

eng: this includes over half a million young people appointed as education assistants, making it the largest youth employment programme ever undertaken in our history.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya abantu abasha abangaphezu kwesigamu sesigidi abaqashwe njengabasizi bothisha, lokho okwenza ukuthi kube nguhlelo olukhulu kunazo zonke oselake lanika abantu abasha umsebenzi emlandweni wethu.

eng: the employment stimulus will also enable the department of home affairs to recruit 10 000 unemployed young people for the digitisation of paper records, enhancing their skills and contributing to the modernisation of citizen services.
zul: uhlelo lokusungulwa kwemisebenzi luzophinde luvumele umnyango wezasekhaya ukuthi uqashe abantu abasha abangasebenzi abayizi-10 000 abazosusa imininingwane egcinwe emaphepheni bayifake kumakhompyutha, lokho okuzothuthukisa amakhono abo futhi babe negalelo ekwethuleleni izakhamuzi izinsiza ngesimanjemanje.

eng: the social employment fund will create a further 50 000 work opportunities using the capability of organisations beyond government, in areas such as urban agriculture, early childhood development, public art and tackling gender-based violence.
zul: isikhwama sokusiza abangasebenzi emphakathini sizosungula amanye amathuba emisebenzi ayizi-50 000 ngokusebenzisa amakhono ezinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, endimeni efana nezolimo zesimanjemanje, ukukhuliswa kwabantwana, ezobuciko kanye nokulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile.

eng: in addition to expanding public employment, we are providing support to young people to prepare them for work and link them to opportunities.
zul: ngaphezu kokukhulisa ukuqashwa kwabantu kuhulumeni, seseka abantu abasha ukubalungiselela umsebenzi futhi sibaxhumanise namathuba omsebenzi.

eng: to encourage hiring by smaller businesses, we will be increasing the value and expanding the criteria for participation in the employment tax incentive.
zul: ukugqugquzela ukuthi amabhizinisi amancane aqashe abantu, sizokhulisa inani kanye nendlela yokuba yingxenye yesikhuthazi sentela yokuqasha.

eng: for several years, this has been an effective way to encourage companies to hire new work seekers.
zul: eminyakeni eminingi, lokhu kube yindlela yokugqugquzela izinkampani ukuthi ziqashe abantu abasha abafuna umsebenzi.

eng: the changes to the incentive will make it easier for small businesses in particular to hire young people.
zul: izinguquko kulesi sikhuthazi zizokwenza kubelula kakhulu ukuthi amabhizinisi amancane aqashe abantu abasha.

eng: the minister of finance will announce the details of these changes in the budget.
zul: ungqongqoshe wezezimali uzomemezela imininingwane yalezi zinguquko kwisabelomali.

eng: we call on companies to support this effort, take up the incentive and give young people a place in the world of work.
zul: sinxusa izinkampani ukuthi zeseke lo mzamo, bathathe lesi sikhuthazi bese benika abantu abasha indawo yokusebenza.

eng: the sayouth.
zul: inkundla ye-sayouth.

eng: mobi platform for young work seekers to access opportunities and support now has more than 2.3 million young south africans registered.
zul: mobi yabantu abasha abafuna umsebenzi ukufinyelela emathubeni kanye nokwesekwa manje seyinabantu abasha abangaphezu kwezigidi ezi-2.3 ababhalisile kuyona.

eng: of these over 600 000 have been placed into employment opportunities.
zul: abayizi-600 000 kulaba sebefakiwe emsebenzini.

eng: a revitalised national youth service will recruit its first cohort of 50 000 young people during the next year, creating opportunities for young people to contribute to their communities, develop their skills and grow their employability.
zul: uhlelo oluvuselelwe lwe-national youth service luzoqasha iqembu lokuqala labantu abasha abayizi-50 000 ngonyaka ozayo, lusungulele abantu abasha amathuba okuba negalelo emiphakathini yabo, bathuthukise amakhono abo futhi bakhulise namathuba abo okuqasheka.

eng: the department of higher education and training will place 10,000 unemployed tvet graduates in workplaces from april 2022. in preparing this sona, i was assisted by two young south africans who are working as interns in the presidency, ms naledi malatji and ms kearabetswe mabatle.
zul: umnyango wezemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqeshwa uzofaka abafundi asebethole iziqu zabo zase-tvet abangasebenzi abayizi-10 000 ezindaweni zomsebenzi kusuka ngombasa ngowezi-2022.

eng: they told me about the pain felt by young people who find themselves with a qualification, but are unemployed because of lack of experience.
zul: ekulungiseleleni le-sona, bengisizwa abantu abasebasha ababili balapha eningizimu afrika abasebenza njengabafundi abasaqeqeshelwa umsebenzi ehhovisi likamongameli, unks naledi malatji kanye nonks ms kearabetswe mabatle.

eng: this forces many into jobs that have little or nothing to do with what they studied.
zul: bangitshele ngobuhlungu obuzwiwa abantu abasha abazithola beneziqu zemfundo, kodwa bengasebenzi ngenxa yokweswela isipiliyoni.

eng: all of the measures i have outlined are essential to provide young people with the work experience that they need to take their first step into the labour market.
zul: lokhu kuphoqelela abaningi ukuthi basebenze imisebenzi engahambisani nhlobo nalokho abakufundele.

eng: we are calling on the private sector to support these measures – and, wherever possible, to drop experience as a hiring requirement – to give as many young people as possible their first job.
zul: sicela umkhakha ozimele ukuthi weseke lezi zinyathelo – futhi uma kwenzeka, basiyeke lesi sidingo sesipiliyoni uma beqasha – ukuze bezonika abantu abasha abaningi ithuba lokusebenza lokuqala.

eng: as we work to grow the economy and create jobs, we will expand support to poor families to ensure that no person in this country has to endure the pain and indignity of hunger.
zul: njengoba sisebenza ukukhulisa umnotho nokusungula imisebenzi, sizonweba ukwesekwa kwemindeni entulayo ukuze sizoqinisekisa ukuthi akekho umuntu kuleli lizwe okumele amelane nobuhlungu nokuthunazwa isithunzi ngenxa yendlala.

eng: our social protection system is among the greatest achievements of the democratic government, reaching more than 18 million people every month.
zul: uhlelo-kusebenza lwethu lokuvikela umphakathi lungolunye lwempumelelo enkulu kahulumeni wentando yeningi labantu, olufinyelela kubantu abayizigidi eziyi-18 njalo ngenyanga.

eng: without this support, millions more people would live in dire poverty.
zul: ngaphandle kwalolu sizo, ezinye izigidi zabantu zingaphila enhluphekweni.

eng: since the onset of covid-19, the social relief of distress grant has provided support to more than 10 million unemployed people who were most vulnerable to the impact of the pandemic.
zul: selokhu kwaqubuka i-covid-19, isibonelelo senhlalo sabangasebenzi sesisize abantu abangasebenzi abangaphezu kwezigidi ezilishumi abebekhahlamezeke kakhulu ngumthelela wobhubhane.

eng: some people used that money to start businesses.
zul: abanye abantu basebenzisa leyo mali ukuqala amabhizinisi.

eng: mr thando makhubu from soweto received the r350 grant for seven months last year, and saved it to open an ice-cream store that now employs four people.
zul: umnu thando makhubu wase-soweto wathola isibonelelo sama-r350 izinyanga eziyisikhombisa ngonyaka owedlule, wayibeka ukuze avule isitolo sika-ice cream manje esiqashe abantu abane.

eng: mr lindokuhle msomi, an unemployed tv producer from kwamashu hostel, saved the r350 grant he received for nine months to start a fast food stall and to support his family.
zul: umnu lindokuhle msomi, ongumdidiyeli kumabonakude ongasebenzi wakwamashu ehostela, wabeka imali yakhe yesibonelelo sama-r350 izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ukuze aqale isitolo sokudla ukuze ondle umndeni wakhe.

eng: as much as it has had a substantial impact, we must recognise that we face extreme fiscal constraints.
zul: yize sibe nomphumela omkhulu, kumele sazi ukuthi sibhekene nezingqinamba kwezezimali.

eng: a fiscal crisis would hurt the poor worst of all through the deterioration of the basic services on which they rely.
zul: inkinga kwezezimali ingalimaza abantulayo ikakhulukazi ekwehleni kwezidingongqangi abathembele kuzo.

eng: mindful of the proven benefits of the grant, we will extend the r350 grant for one further year, to the end of march 2023. during this time, we will engage in broad consultations and detailed technical work to identify the best options to replace this grant.
zul: ngokucabangela kakhulu usizo lesibonelelo, sizokwandisa isibonelelo sama-r350 ngomunye unyaka, kuyoze kuphele undasa wezi-2023.

eng: any future support must pass the test of affordability, and must not come at the expense of basic services or at the risk of unsustainable spending.
zul: ngalesi sikhathi, sizoxoxisana kabanzi futhi sicubungulisise umsebenzi wokuthola izindlela ezisebenzayo ezizongena esikhundleni salesi sibonelelo.

eng: it remains our ambition to establish a minimum level of support for those in greatest need.
zul: kusalokhu kuliphupho lethu ukusungula izinga eliphansi lokusiza labo abaludinga kakhulu.

eng: expanding access to land is vital for our efforts to reduce hunger and provide people with meaningful livelihoods.
zul: ukukhulisa ukufinyelela kumhlaba kubaluleke kakhulu ukuze imizamo yethu yokwehlisa indlala nokuhlinzeka abantu ngezindlela ezibonakalayo zokuziphilisa.

eng: we are moving ahead with land reform in terms of the constitution, and anticipate the approval of the expropriation bill during this year.
zul: siqhubekela phambili nokuguqulwa komhlaba ngokuhambisana nomthethosisekelo, kanye nokulindela ukugunyazwa komthethosivivinywa wokubuyiselwa komhlaba kulo nyaka.

eng: the establishment of the agriculture and land reform development agency will be finalised this year.
zul: ukusungulwa kwe-ejensi yezokuthuthukiswa kwezolimo nokuguqulwa komhlaba kuzophothulwa kulo nyaka.

eng: the department of public works and infrastructure will finalise the transfer of 14 000 hectares of state land to the housing development agency.
zul: umnyango wezemisebenzi kahulumeni nengqalasizinda uzophothula ukudluliswa komhlaba kahulumeni ongama-hectare ayizi-14 000 kwi-ejensi yokwakhiwa kwezindlu.

eng: we have enough arable land to support millions of thriving small-scale farmers in poultry, livestock, fruit and vegetables.
zul: sinomhlaba olimekayo owanele ukweseka izigidi zabalimi abancane bezinkukhu, imfuyo, izithelo nezitshalo.

eng: through the presidential employment stimulus and the solidarity fund, over 100 000 farmers have already received input vouchers to expand their production.
zul: ngohlelo lukamongameli lokusungula imisebenzi nesikhwama sobumbano, abalimi abangaphezu kwezi-100 000 sebewatholile amavawusha okukhulisa imikhiqizo yabo.

eng: this scheme has proven to be effective and impactful.
zul: lolu hlelo selubonakele ukuthi luyasebenza futhi lushintsha izimpilo.

eng: the agriculture sector has also recognised the importance of supporting small-scale farmers and integrating them into value chains.
zul: umkhakha wezolimo usubonise ukubaluleka kokweseka abalimi abancane nokubafaka emisebenzini yokukhiqiza.

eng: through the sugar master plan, the industry has provided r225 million to over 12 000 small-scale sugar cane growers as part of a r1 billion commitment to support black farmers.
zul: ngohlelo olukhulu lwemboni kashukela, le mboni isihlinzeke abalimi bomoba abancane abangaphezu kwezi-12 000 ngezigidi ezingama-r225 njengengxenye yesethembiso sokusiza ngesigidigidi esi-r1 ukweseka abalimi abamnyama.

eng: we will be expanding the provision of input vouchers and calling on other sectors to join this effort, so that we can collectively reach up to 250 000 small-scale farmers this year.
zul: sizokwandisa ukuhlinzekwa kwamavawusha kanye nokunxenxa eminye imikhakha ukuthi izibandakanye kulo mzamo, ukuze sizokwazi ukuthi ngokubambisana sifinyelele kubalimi abancane abayizi-250 000 kulo nyaka.

eng: none of our efforts to revive our economy will succeed if we do not tackle the scourge of corruption once and for all.
zul: awukho umzamo wethu wokuvuselela umnotho ozophumelela uma singakhiphi siqede isihlava senkohlakalo manje.

eng: since the beginning of the year, i have been provided with the first two parts of the report of the commission of inquiry into state capture headed by acting chief justice raymond zondo.
zul: selokhu kuqale unyaka, senginikwe izahluko ezimbili zokuqala zombiko wekhomishana ephenya ngokuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso eholwa ibamba lenhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo.

eng: while the definitive conclusion has yet to be delivered at the end of this month, the first two parts of the report make it plain that there was indeed ‘state capture’.
zul: ngesikhathi isiphetho esiqinisekisiwe sisazolethwa ekupheleni kwale nyanga, izahluko ezimbili zokuqala zombiko zikubeka ngokusobala ukuthi nebala kwaba khona ngempela ‘ukuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso’.

eng: this means that public institutions and state-owned enterprises (soes) were infiltrated by a criminal network intent on looting public money for private gain.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi izikhungo zikahulumeni nezinkampani eziphethwe uhulumeni (ama-soe) bezingcoliswe inhloso yobugebengu bokuzenzela inzuzo ngokweba izimali zikahulumeni.

eng: the reports have detailed the devastating effects of this criminal activity on south african airways, transnet, denel, south african revenue service (sars) and government communications.
zul: imibiko ichaza ngemithelela engumonakalo yalobu bugebengu kwezezindiza eningizimu afrika, e-transnet, e-denel, kwezokuqoqwa kwentela eningizimu afrika (i-sars) kanye nophiko lwezokuxhumana kuhulumeni.

eng: state capture had a direct and very concrete negative impact on the lives of all south africans, but especially the poorest and most vulnerable members of our society.
zul: ukuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso kunomthelela omubi oqonde ngqo futhi ojule kakhulu ezimpilweni zabantu baseningizimu afrika, kodwa ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi nalabo ababuthakathaka kakhulu emphakathini wethu.

eng: it has weakened the ability of the state to deliver services and to meet the expectations and constitutional rights of people.
zul: kuqede amandla ombuso wokuletha izinsiza kanye nokuhlangabezana nezidingo ezilindelekile kanye namalungelo abantu omthethosisekelo.

eng: we must now do everything in our power to ensure that it never happens again.
zul: manje kufanele senze konke okusemandleni ethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lokhu akuphinde kwenzeke futhi.

eng: my responsibility is to ensure that the commission report is properly and carefully considered and then acted upon.
zul: umsebenzi wami ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umbiko wekhomishana ucatshangwa ngendlela eyiyo nangokucophelela bese kuthathwa isinyathelo kulokho.

eng: by no later than 30 june, i will present a plan of action in response to the commission’s recommendations.
zul: ungakadluli umhla wama-30 kunhlangulana, ngizokwethula isinyathelo esizothathwa ngokuphendula izincomo zekhomishana.

eng: we will, as the commission’s first report recommends, strengthen the system to protect whistle-blowers, who are a vital safeguard in the fight against corruption and who take huge personal risk in reporting wrongdoing.
zul: njengokusho kwezincomo zombiko wokuqala wekhomishana, siyobe-ke, sesiqinisa uhlelo-kusebenza lokuvikela izingede, njengoba ziyihawu elibalulekile ekulweni nenkohlakalo futhi zibeka izimpilo zazo engcupheni ngokubika imikhuba emibi eyenziwayo.

eng: we are doing a detailed review of all applicable legislation and a comparative study of other jurisdictions to strengthen whistle-blower protection.
zul: sibuyekeza ngokugcwele yonke imithetho efanelekile kanye nocwaningo oluqhathanisayo lwamandla omthetho okuqinisa ukuvikelwa kwezingede.

eng: the relevant law enforcement agencies are taking the necessary steps to address the immediate concern about the safety of whistle blowers.
zul: abezomthetho abafanelekile bathatha izinyathelo ezifanele ukubhekana nokukhathazeka ngokuphepha kwezingede.

eng: many individuals and companies that the commission has found were responsible for state capture must now be held to account.
zul: abantu abaningi kanye nezinkampani ikhomishana ebathole ukuthi babe nesandla ekuqhwagweni kwamandla ombuso kumele babekwe icala.

eng: i have every confidence that the national prosecuting authority (npa) will carry out the further investigations that the commission has recommended, and that it will bring the members of the criminal network that infiltrated government and captured the state swiftly to justice.
zul: angingabazi ukuthi uphiko lwezokushushisa eningizimu afrika (i-npa) izoqhubeka nolunye uphenyo ikhomishana elufake kwizincomo zalo, nokuthi izoletha wonke amalungu emigulukudu engcolise uhulumeni futhi aqhwaga amandla ombuso ukuthi abhekane nomthetho.

eng: the investigating directorate in the npa is now poised to deliver on its crucial mandate, and a dedicated team has been established to pursue these cases.
zul: uphiko lwezokuphenywa kwamacala e-npa njengamanje lume ngomumo ukufeza igunya elibaluleke kakhulu, futhi nethimba elizinikele selisunguliwe ukuqhubeka nala macala.

eng: we will be appointing a new head of the investigating directorate following the departure of adv hermione cronje from that position.
zul: sizobeka esikhundleni inhloko entsha yophiko lwezokuphenywa kwamacala kulandela ukushiya kukammeli hermione cronje kuleso sikhundla.

eng: an amendment to the state capture commission regulations in june 2020, empowered the sharing of information between the commission and law enforcement agencies.
zul: ukuchitshiyelwa kwemithethonqubo yekhomishana ephenya ngokuqhwagwa kombuso ngonhlangulana ngowezi-2020, kwanika amandla ukwabelana ngolwazi phakathi kwekhomishana nama-ejensi ezomthetho.

eng: this amendment also permitted the employment of the state capture commission personnel by law enforcement agencies.
zul: lokhu kuchitshiyelwa kwaphinde kwavumela ukusetshenziswa kwabasebenzi bekhomishana ephenya ngokuqhwagwa kombuso ngama-ejensi ezomthetho.

eng: these empowering provisions has geared the investigating directorate to more effectively pursue the investigations emanating from the commission.
zul: lezi zinhlinzeko ezinika amandla zifake umfutho ophikweni lwezokuphenywa kwamacala ukuqhuba ngendlela eyiyo uphenyo oluphuma kwikhomishana.

eng: we have gratefully acknowledged the offer of support from the private sector to assist in providing those skills which we lack in government to enable investigation and prosecution of crime.
zul: siyabonga kakhulu ngesicelo esiphuma kumkhakha ozimele sokusisiza ngokuhlinzeka ngalawo makhono esingenawo kuhulumeni ukuze kuzophenywa kushushiswe ubugebengu.

eng: to ensure that the prosecuting authority remains true to its constitutional obligation and to ensure transparency, we are developing a framework for private sector cooperation that will be managed through national treasury.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iziphathimandla kwezokushushiswa zihlala zineqiniso kwisibophezelo zabo somthethosisekelo kanye nokuqinisekisa ukwenza izinto obala, sisungula uhlaka lokubambisana nomkhakha ozimele oluzolawulwa ngumgcinimafa kuzwelonke.

eng: there are also discussions underway with the judiciary for the creation of special court rolls for state capture and corruption cases.
zul: kunezingxoxo futhi eziqhubekayo nezobulungiswa zokusungulwa kwemiqulu yenkantolo ekhethekile yamacala okuqhwagwa kombuso nawenkohlakalo.

eng: while we have taken decisive steps to end the era of state capture, we know that the fight against corruption is far from over.
zul: ngesikhathi sithatha isinyathelo sanquma ukuqeda isikhathi sokuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso, siyazi ukuthi ukulwa nenkohlakalo kusekude ukuphela.

eng: even as the country was suffering the devastation of the covid-19 pandemic, companies and individuals were conspiring with public officials to defraud the government of billions of rand in covid-related contracts.
zul: ngisho ngesikhathi lapho izwe belikhahlamezwa ubhubhane lwe-covid-19, izinkampani kanye nabantu bebehlangene ngezimali zikahulumeni ukukhwabanisela uhulumeni izigidigidi zamarandi ngezinkontileka ezihambisana ne-covid-19.

eng: as soon as evidence emerged of this corruption we acted.
zul: ngokushesha emva kokuthola ubufakazi bale nkohlakalo sasukuma.

eng: we withdrew certain emergency procurement regulations, set up a fusion centre that brought together various law enforcement agencies, published the details of all covid-related contracts online and instituted the most extensive investigation that the special investigating unit (siu) has undertaken since its formation.
zul: simise imithethomgomo ethile yokuthenga impahla ngokuphuthuma, sasungula iskhungo i-fusion centre esahlanganisa ndawonye ama-ejensi ezomthetho, sashicilela imininingwane yezinkontileka ezihlobne ne-covid-19 ku-inthanethi futhi saqalisa uphenyo olunzulu oluqalwe uphiko oluphenya ngamacala akhethekile (i-siu) esike yalwenza selokhu yasungulwa.

eng: in december, the siu submitted its final report on its investigation into covid-related contracts.
zul: ngozibandlela, i-siu yaletha umbiko wayo wokugcina ngophenyo lwezinkontileka ezihlobene ne-covid-19.

eng: as a result, 45 matters, with a combined value of r2.1 billion, have been enrolled with the special tribunal.
zul: umphumela walokho, amacala angama-45, enani elihlangene eliyizigidigidi ezi-r2.1, adluliselwe enkantolo ekhethekile.

eng: the siu has referred 224 government officials for disciplinary action and referred 386 cases for possible prosecution to the npa.
zul: i-siu idlulisele izikhulu zikahulumeni ezingama-224 ukuthi ziqondiswe izigwegwe futhi yadlulisela amacala angama-386 ukuthi ayoshushiswa ku-npa.

eng: the presidency has set up mechanisms to monitor implementation of the recommendations of the siu and ensure that government departments and entities act against those who have violated regulations and broken the law.
zul: ihhovisi likamongameli libeke izindlela zokuqapha ukuqaliswa kwezincomo ze-siu kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi iminyango kahulumeni kanye nezinkampani zithathela isinyathelo labo abaphule imithethomgomo futhi baphula umthetho.

eng: the fight against corruption will take on a new intensity thanks to the outcomes of the state capture commission, the strengthening of law enforcement agencies and the implementation of new anti-corruption practices in the public service.
zul: ukulwa nenkohlakalo kuzoba nomfutho futhi ngalokho sibonga imiphumela yekhomishana ephenya ngokuqhwagwa kombuso, ukuqiniswa kwama-ejensi ezomthetho kanye nokuqaliswa kwezindlela ezintsha zokulwisana nenkohlakalo kuhulumeni.

eng: soes play a vital role in our economy.
zul: ama-soe adlala indima ebalulekile emnothweni wethu.

eng: from water and roads, to energy and ports, to defence and aviation, these strategic assets are necessary to keep our country running.
zul: kusuka emanzini kuya emigwaqeni, kuya kwezamandla namachweba, kuya kwezokuvikela nezezindiza, lezi zimpahla ziyadingeka ukugcina izwe lethu liqhubekela phambili.

eng: it is essential that we reverse their decline, and position them to contribute positively.
zul: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi sibuyisele emuva ukwehla kwazo, sizibeke endaweni lapho zizoba negalelo elihle.

eng: we have therefore embarked on several immediate measures to restore these companies to health, at the same time as we undertake far-reaching reforms that will make our soes more efficient, competitive, accountable and sustainable.
zul: ngakho-ke siqalise izinyathelo eziningana ukubuyisela lezi zinkampani ukuthi zibe sesimweni esihle, ngaso leso sikhathi silandela izinguquko ezizokwenza ama-soe asebenze, ancintisane, aziphendulele futhi asimame.

eng: the presidential soe council, which i appointed in 2020, has recommended that government adopt a centralised shareholder model for its key commercial state-owned companies.
zul: umkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe, engawubeka ngowezi-2020, wethule isincomo sokuthi uhulumeni asebenzise indlela eyodwa yokusebenza kwabanikazi-zabelo ezolandelwa izinkampani eziphethwe uhulumeni ezibalulekile kwezentengiso.

eng: this would separate the state’s ownership functions from its policy-making and regulatory functions, minimise the scope for political interference, introduce greater professionalism and manage state assets in a way that protects shareholder value.
zul: lokhu kuzohlukanisa imisebenzi yobunikazi bombuso nemisebenzi yokusungula imithethonqubo kanye nemisebenzi yokulawula, okuzonciphisa ukugxambukela kwezepolitiki, kukhulise ukusebenza ngendlela efanele nokuphathwa kwempahla kahulumeni ngendlela evikela inani lezabelo.

eng: as part of this, preparatory work has begun for the establishment of a state-owned holding company to house strategic soes and to exercise coordinated shareholder oversight.
zul: njengengxenye yalokhu, umsebenzi wokulungiselela usuqalile ukuze kuzosungulwa inkampani enkulu engaphansi kukahulumeni ezokwengamela amaqhingasu ama-soe kanye nokulawula nokubheka izabelo.

eng: to ensure that soes are effectively fulfilling their responsibilities, the presidential soe council is preparing recommendations on soes to be retained, consolidated or disposed of.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ama-soe ayawenza ngokugcwele umsebenzi wawo, umkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe ulungisa izincomo zokuthi ama-soe agcinwe, ahlanganiswe noma achithwe.

eng: any recommendations would be subject to extensive consultation with all stakeholders.
zul: noma yiziphi izincomo zizokwenziwa emva kwezingxoxo nabo bonke ababambiqhaza.

eng: we are taking steps to safeguard our democracy, protect our economic infrastructure and build safer communities for all.
zul: sithatha izinyathelo zokuvikela intando yeningi labantu yethu, sivikele ingqalasizinda yezomnotho kanye nokwakha imiphakathi ephephile kuwona wonke umuntu.

eng: earlier this week, we released the report of the expert panel into the civil unrest in july last year.
zul: ekuqaleni kwaleli viki, sakhipha umbiko wethimba longoti ababephenya ngezibhelu ngontulikazi wangonyaka owedlule.

eng: the report paints a deeply disturbing picture of the capabilities of our security services and the structures that exist to coordinate their work.
zul: umbiko uveza isithombe esethusayo samakhono ezokuphepha kuleli kanye nezinhlaka ezikhona ukwenza umsebenzi wabo.

eng: the report concludes that government’s initial handling of the july 2021 events was inept, police operational planning was poor, there was poor coordination between the state security and intelligence services, and police are not always embedded in the communities they serve.
zul: umbiko uphetha ngokuthi uhulumeni indlela aphatha ngayo udaba lwezibhelu zangontulikazi ngowezi-2021 yayingafanelekile, ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa kwakukubi kakhulu, kwakungekho ukulawula isimo phakathi kwezokuphepha zikahulumeni kanye nabezobunhloli, futhi amaphoyisa ebengahlali njalo emiphakathini ayisebenzelayo.

eng: the expert panel said that if the violence has exposed anything it was the poverty and inequality that is the root cause of the desperation of the people of south africa.
zul: ithimba longoti lithe udlame luveze obala ububha kanye nokungalingani okuyiwona mnyombo wokuphelelwa ithemba kubantu baseningizimu afrika.

eng: the expert panel found that cabinet must take overall responsibility for the events of july 2021. this is a responsibility that we acknowledge and accept.
zul: ithimba longoti lithole ukuthi ikhabhinethi yiyona okumele izibophezele ngezinselele zomonakalo wezibhelu zangontulikazi kowezi-2021.

eng: we will, as recommended by the panel, develop and drive a national response plan to address the weaknesses that the panel has identified.
zul: njengokwezincomo zethimba longoti, sizosungula futhi siqhube uhlelo lukazwelonke lokubhekana nokuntengantega okubonwe yileli thimba.

eng: we will begin immediately by filling critical vacancies and addressing positions affected by suspensions in the state security agency and crime intelligence.
zul: sizoqala njengamanje ngokugcwalisa izikhundla zomsebenzi ezibaluleke kakhulu nokulungisa izikhundla ezithintwe ngukumiswa emsebenzini kwe-ejensi yezokuphepha kombuso kanye nobunhloli kwezobugebengu.

eng: we will soon be announcing leadership changes in a number of security agencies to strengthen our security structures.
zul: maduze-nje sizomemezela izinguquko ebuholini kuma-ejensi ezokuphepha amaningi ukuze kuzoqiniswa izinhlaka zethu zezokuphepha.

eng: the staffing of the public order policing unit of the south african police service will be brought to an appropriate level, with appropriate training courses in place.
zul: ukuqashwa kwabantu ophikweni lwamaphoyisa lokuvikelwa komphakathi olungaphansi kophiko lwamaphoyisa eningizimu afrika sekuzoya esigabeni esifanele, esihambisana nokuqeqeshwa okufanele osekuhleliwe.

eng: the ongoing damage to and theft of economic infrastructure has damaged confidence and severely constrained economic growth, investment and job creation.
zul: umonakalo oqhubekayo nokwebiwa kwengqalasizinda yezomnotho isithunaze ukuzethemba futhi yakhinyabeza ukukhula komnotho, utshalomali kanye nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi.

eng: at the same time, we need to confront the criminal gangs that invade construction sites and other business places to extort money from companies.
zul: khona kunjalo, sidinga ukubhekana ngqo namaqembu ezigilamkhuba ezihlasela izindawo zokwakha kanye namanye amabhizinisi ukuyophanga imali ezinkampanini.

eng: this requires a focused and coordinated response.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuthi sigxile futhi sibe nendlela edidiyelwe yokubhekana nakho.

eng: government has therefore established specialise multi-disciplinary units to address economic sabotage, extortion at construction sites and vandalism of infrastructure.
zul: uhulumeni usesungule izingxenye ezikhethekile zokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe ukuze zizobhekana nokucekelwa phansi komnotho, ukuphanga ezindaweni zomsebenzi kanye nokucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda.

eng: we will make resources available to recruit and train an additional 12 000 new police personnel to ensure that the south african police service urgently gets the capacity it needs.
zul: kuzoba khona izinsiza zokuqasha nokuqeqesha amaphoyisa amasha ayizi-12 000 ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uphiko lwamaphoyisa eningizimu afrika luthola abasebenzi elibadingayo ngokushesha.

eng: another area of immediate attention will be the re-establishment of community policing forums to improve relations and coordination between local police and residents of the areas they serve.
zul: enye ingxenye edinga ukunkwa ngokushesha kuzoba ukusungulwa kabusha kwamaphoyisa omphakathi ukwenza ngcono ubudlelwano kanye nokulawula okungcono phakathi kwamaphoyisa endawo kanye nabahlali ezindaweni azisebenzelayo.

eng: it is clear from the observations of the expert panel that we need to take a more inclusive approach to assessing the threats to our country’s security and determining the necessary responses.
zul: kucace bha ngokubuka kwethimba longoti ukuthi sidinga ukusebenzisa indlela ebandakanya wonke umuntu ukucwaninga izinsongo ezibhekiswe ekuphepheni kwezwe lethu kanye nokuthola izindlela zokubhekana nalokhu.

eng: i am calling on all south africans through their various formations to participate in developing our national security strategy.
zul: nginxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngokuhlukahlukana kwabo ukuthi babe yingxenye yokuthuthukisa iqhingasu likazwelonke lezokuphepha lethu.

eng: i will be approaching parliament’s presiding officers to request that parliament plays a key role in facilitating inclusive processes of consultation.
zul: ngizoya kwizikhulu ezengamele ephalamende ngiyocela ukuthi iphalamende lidlale indima ebaluleke kakhulu ekulawuleni izinqubo zezingxoxo ezibandakanya wonke umuntu.

eng: the security services have been tasked by the national security council to urgently develop implementation plans that address the range of recommendations made by the expert panel.
zul: abezokuphepha banikwe umsebenzi ngumkhandlu wezokuphepha kuzwelonke ukuthi basungule izinhlelo eziphuthumayo zokuqalisa ukulandela uchungechunge lwezincomo ezenziwe ithimba longoti.

eng: these measures will go a long way to address the serious concerns about the breakdown of law and order in society.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zizoba lusizo esikhathini eside esizayo ekubhekaneni nezinkinga ngokuphulwa komthetho kanye nokuthula emphakathini.

eng: this year, we are intensifying the fight against gender-based violence and femicide through implementation of the national strategic plan on gender-based violence and femicide, and other measures to promote the empowerment of women.
zul: kulo nyaka, siqinisa ukulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane ngokuqalisa uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke kudlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane, kanye nezinye izinyathelo ezigqugquzela ukunika amandla abesifazane.

eng: earlier this month, i signed into law three new pieces of legislation, which has strengthened the criminal justice system, promoting accountability across the state and supporting survivors.
zul: ekuqaleni kwale nyanga, ngaphasisa izingxenye ezintsha ezintathu zomthetho, eseziqinise uhlelo-kusebenza lwezobulungiswa kwezobugebengu, zagqugquzela ukuziphendulela kuhulumeni kanye nokweseka labo abasindile.

eng: the implementation of this legislation will go a long way to ensuring that cases are successfully prosecuted, that survivors are protected and that there are more effective deterrents in place.
zul: ukuqaliswa kokusebenza kwalo mthetho kuzosiza kakhulu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amacala ashushiswa ngempumelelo, nokuthi abasindile bayavikelwa futhi kunezinto eziningi ezizogwema lokhu.

eng: we have made significant progress in reducing the backlog in dna processing, reducing it from 210 000 exhibits in april 2021 to around 58 000 at present.
zul: sesenze inqubekela-phambili ebonakalayo ekunciphiseni ukusalela emuva kokuhlolwa kolibofuzo i-dna, ngokukunciphisa kusuka kubufakazi obuyizi-210 00 ngombasa ngowezi-2021 kuya kwizi-58 000 njengamanje.

eng: however, the fight against gender-based violence will never be won unless, as society, we mobilise all formations and all citizens behind a sustained programme of social action.
zul: noma kunjalo, impi yodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile angeke siyinqobe ngaphandle, uma njengomphakathi, sinxenxa bonke abantu ngokwehlukahlukana kwabo kanye nezakhamuzi zonke ukuthi zibe yingxenye yohlelo lokusukuma komphakathi.

eng: as the covid-19 pandemic has starkly demonstrated, a nation’s health is inextricably linked with its economic progress and social development.
zul: njengoba i-covid-19 isibonise ngokumangazayo, ezempilo zesizwe angeke ziyihlukanise nenqubekela-phambili yomnotho kanye nokuthuthukiswa komphakathi.

eng: we will therefore continue with the work underway to ensure universal health coverage for everyone in south africa, regardless of their ability to pay.
zul: ngakho-ke sizoqhubeka nomsebenzi oqhubekayo wokuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezempilo kuwo wonke umuntu eningizimu afrika, ngaphandle nokubheka ukuthi bayakwazi ukukukhokhela na.

eng: while public hearings on the national health (nhi) bill are continuing in parliament, much progress is being made in preparing for the introduction of nhi.
zul: ngesikhathi ukulalelwa komphakathi mayelana nomthethosivivinywa wezempilo kuzwelonke (i-nhi) kuqhubeka ephalamende, inqubekela-phambili enkulu iyenziwa ekulungiseleleni ukwethulwa kwe-nhi.

eng: more than 59 million people are registered in the health patient registration system.
zul: abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-59 sebebhalisile kuhlelo-kusebenza lokubhaliswa kweziguli.

eng: by september 2021, more than 56 000 additional health workers had been recruited and more than 46 000 community health workers integrated into the public health system.
zul: ngomandulo ngowezi-2021, bangaphezu kwezi-56 000 abasebenzi bezempilo abongezeleliwe abaqashiwe futhi bangaphezu kwezi-46 000 onompilo abafakwe kuhlelo-kusebenza lwezempilo kuhulumeni.

eng: for the last two years, the education of our children and young people has been severely disrupted.
zul: eminyakeni emibili eyedlule, imfundo yabantwana bethu kanye nabantu abasha iphazamiseke kakhulu.

eng: as we return to normal educational activity, we will work harder to ensure that all learners and students get the quality education they need and deserve.
zul: njengoba sibuyela esimweni esejwayelekile, sizosebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abafundi nezitshudeni bathola imfundo esezingeni abayidingayo futhi ebafanele.

eng: fellow south africans,government must work for the people.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika,uhulumeni kumele usebenzele abantu.

eng: that is why our foremost priority is to build a capable, ethical and developmental state.
zul: yingakho sibeke eqhulwini ukwakha umbuso onekhono, onomthetho nothuthukayo.

eng: we will soon be finalising a framework for the professionalisation of the public service.
zul: maduze-nje sizophothula uhlaka lokusebenza ngendlela efanele kuhulumeni.

eng: this will include tighter measures for recruitment of public servants, continuous professional development through the national school of government and partnerships between state bodies, professional associations and universities.
zul: lokhu kuzofaka phakathi izinyathelo eziqinile zokuqashwa kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni, ukuthuthukiswa okuqhubekayo kokusebenza ngendlela ngokusebenzisana nesikole sikahulumeni kuzwelonke nokusebenzisana phakathi kwezinhlangano zikahulumeni, izinhlangano zabasebenzi namanyuvesi.

eng: lifestyle audits are already being implemented across the public service.
zul: ucwaningo ngendlela yokuphila luvele seluqalile kwezemisebenzi kahulumeni.

eng: this year, we will continue with the implementation of the ddm.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizoqhubeka nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwe-ddm.

eng: this model brings all three spheres of government together with other social partners in every district to grow inclusive local economies and improve the lives of citizens.
zul: le ndlela iletha ndawonya zonke izinhlaka ezintathu zikahulumeni kanye nabanye esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini kuzo zonke izifunda ukuze kuzokhuliswa iminotho yendawo nokwenza ngcono izimpilo zezakhamuzi.

eng: in particular, the ddm facilitates integrated planning and budgeting across spheres of government and improves integration of national projects at a district level.
zul: ikakhulukazi, i-ddm ibheka ukuhlelwa okuhlanganisile kanye nokwabiwa kwezimali kuyo yonke imikhakha kahulumeni futhi ithuthukisa ukuhlanganiswa kwemiklamo kazwelonke ezingeni lesifunda.

eng: while there are many parts of the state that require much work, there are institutions that continue to serve the people of this country effectively and efficiently.
zul: ngesikhathi kunezingxenye eziningi zikahulumeni ezidinga umsebenzi omkhulu, kunezikhungo eziqhubeka nokusiza abantu baleli lizwe lakithi ngendlela efanele nangempumelelo.

eng: one such institution is the sars, which will be 25 years old this year.
zul: enye yalesi sikhungo i-sars, ezobe iqeda iminyaka engama-25 yasungulwa kulo nyaka.

eng: while sars was badly damaged by state capture, it has made remarkable progress in restoring its integrity, credibility and performance.
zul: yize i-sars yayithunjwe kakhulu ukuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso, isiyenze inqubekela-phambili emangalisayo ekugcineni ubuqotho, ukuthembeka kanye nemiphumela yokusebenza.

eng: since its formation, sars has collected some r16 trillion for the country’s social and economic development.
zul: selokhu yasungulwa, i-sars isiqoqele ukuthuthukiswa komphakathi nomnotho wezwe ama-r16 trillion.

eng: this revenue has enabled government to improve the lives of millions through the provision of healthcare, education, social grants and other basic services.
zul: imali eqoqiwe yenze uhulumeni wakwazi ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabantu abayizigidi ngokuhlinzeka ukunakekelwa kwezempilo, imfundo, izibonelelo zenhlalo kanye nezinye izidingongqangi.

eng: a capable state is not only about the quality of public servants and the efficiency of institutions.
zul: ukuba nombuso onekhono akusikho nje kuphela ukuba nabasebenzi bakahulumeni abasemgangathweni kanye nezikhungo ezisebenza kahle.

eng: it is also, fundamentally, about how citizens are empowered to participate.
zul: kuphinde kube ngukuthi izakhamuzi zinikwa kanjani amandla okuthi zifake igalelo.

eng: we must work together to ensure that platforms like schools governing bodies and community policing forums are more active and inclusive.
zul: kumele sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinkundla ezifana nebhodi elengamele isikole kanye neforamu yamaphoyisa omphakathi ayasebenza futhi ayabandakanyeka.

eng: a vibrant civil society is crucial for a capable state and for development.
zul: umphakathi ophilayo ubalulekile ekubeni nohulumeni onekhono kanye nentuthuko.

eng: we will therefore be working with social partners to convene the long-awaited social sector summit.
zul: ngakho-ke sizosebenza nozakwethu emphakathini ukubamba ingqungquthela yomkhakha womphakathi ekade sasiyilindele.

eng: this summit will seek to improve the interface between the state and civil society and address the challenges that non-governmental organisations and community-based organisations face.
zul: le ngqungquthela izobheka ukwenza ngcono ukubonana ubuso nobuso phakathi kohulumeni nomphakathi bese kuxazululwa izinselele ezibhekene nezinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi.

eng: our country has suffered several damaging blows in recent times.
zul: izwe lethu selikhahlamezeke kakhulu kamuva nje.

eng: a confluence of forces, many of them outside of our control, has brought us to where we are now.
zul: ukuhlangana kwamandla, amaningi awo ebesingeke siwalawule, kusibeke lapha esikhona manje.

eng: we face steep and daunting challenges.
zul: sibhekene nezinselele ezinzima futhi ezesabekayo.

eng: indeed, we are engaged in a battle for the soul of this country.
zul: nebala, sisempini yomphefumulo waleli lizwe.

eng: but there can be no doubt that we will win.
zul: kodwa-ke asithandabuzi ukuthi sizonqoba.

eng: i ask every south african to rally together in our fight against corruption, in our fight to create jobs, in our fight to achieve a more just and equal society.
zul: nginxusa wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika ukuthi sibumbane ekulweni nenkohlakalo, empini yethu yokusungula imisebenzi, empini yethu yokuzuza umphakathi onobulungiswa nolinganayo.

eng: we have faced many crises in our past, and we have overcome them.
zul: sesibhekane nezimo ezibucayi eziningi emlandweni wethu, futhi sizinqobile.

eng: we have been confronted with difficult choices, and we have made them.
zul: sike sabhekana nezinqumo ezinzima, futhi sazithatha.

eng: in trying times, we have shown courage and resiliencetime and time again, we have pulled ourselves back from the brink of despair and inspired hope, renewal and progress.
zul: ezikhathini ezinzima, sibonise isibindi kanye nokuqina.

eng: now, we must do so again.
zul: manje, kumele siphinde senze njalo.

eng: let us forge a new consensus to confront a new reality, a consensus that unites us behind our shared determination to reform our economy and rebuild our institutions.
zul: masenze isivumelwano esisha sokubhekana ngqo nesimo esisha njengoba sinjalo, isivumelwano esisihlanganisa ngenxa yokwabelana ngempokophelo eyodwa yokwakha kabusha umnotho wethu nokwakha kabusha izikhungo zethu.

eng: let us get to work.
zul: masisebenze.

eng: let us rebuild our country.
zul: masakhe kabusha izwe lethu.

eng: and let us leave no one behind.
zul: futhi singashiyi muntu emuva.

eng: speaker of the national assembly, ms nosiviwe mapisa-nqakula, chairperson of the national council of provinces, mr amos masondo, deputy president david mabuza, the executive mayor of the city of cape town, mr geordin hill-lewis, former president thabo mbeki, former deputy president baleka mbete, president of the pan african parliament, the right honourable chief fortune charumbira, chief justice raymond zondo and members of the judiciary, heads of institutions supporting democracy, deputy president of the governing party, mr paul mashatile and leaders of all parties, members of parliament, fellow south africans, it is a great honour to stand before you this evening to present the state of the nation.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, unks nosiviwe mapisa-nqakula, sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli u-david mabuza, usodolobha wedolobha lasekapa, umnu geordin hill-lewis, umongameli waphambilini uthabo mbeki, iphini likamongameli laphambilini ubaleka mbete, umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umhlonishwa inkosi u-fortune charumbira, inhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo kanye namalungu ophiko lwezobulungiswa, izinhloko zezikhungo ezeseka intando yeningi labantu, iphini likamongameli weqembu elibusayo, umnu paul mashatile kanye nabo bonke abaholi bamaqembu, amalungu ephalamende, bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, kuyintokozo enkulu ukuma phambi kwenu kusihlwa nje ngethule inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe.

eng: for we are a nation defined not by the oceans and rivers that form the boundaries of our land.
zul: thina asisona neze isizwe esigabe kuphela ngezilwandle nemifula eyakhe imingcele yezwe lethu.

eng: we are not defined by the minerals under our earth or the spectacular landscape above it.
zul: asigabile kuphela ngezimbiwa ezingaphansi komhlaba wethu noma ubuhle obumangalisayo bezintaba, amagquma namathafa angaphezu kwawo.

eng: we are not even defined by the languages we speak or the songs we sing or the work we do.
zul: asigabile ngisho nangezilimi esizikhulumayo noma amaculo esiwaculayo noma umsebenzi esiwenzayo.

eng: we are, at our most essential, a nation defined by hope and resilience.
zul: kepha okusemqoka kakhulu thina siyisizwe esigabe kakhulu ngethemba namandla okumelana nezimo ezinzima.

eng: it was hope that sustained our struggle for freedom, and it is hope that swells our sails as we steer our country out of turbulent waters to calmer seas.
zul: yithemba elakhuthaza futhi lagqugquzela ukuqhubeka nokusimama komzabalazo wethu wenkululeko, futhi yithemba elisinika amandla nogqozi ngenkathi siqhuba izwe lethu okomkhumbi ohamba olwandle olugubha amagagasi uphokophele emanzini acwebileyo.

eng: even in these trying times, it is hope that sustains us and fuels our determination to overcome even the greatest of difficulties.
zul: ngisho kulezi zikhathi ezinzima imbala, yithemba elisinikeza amandla okuqhubekela phambili futhi elikhuthaza ukuzimisela kwethu ukunqoba ngisho obukhulukazi ubunzima.

eng: just three years ago, our country was devastated by the worst global pandemic in living memory.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu nje edlulile, izwe lethu labe likhahlanyezwe wubhubhane olukhulukazi emhlabeni olungakaze lubonakale emlandweni.

eng: thousands of lives were lost, companies closed, jobs were lost.
zul: bayizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane abantu abalahlekelwa yimiphefumulo yabo, nezinkampani ezavalwa, nemisebenzi eyalahleka.

eng: covid-19 did not browbeat us into submission or disillusionment.
zul: ukukhahlanyezwa yi-covid-19 akusiphendulanga amavaka sigcine sesifake imisila phakathi kwemilenze okwengcanga noma siphelelwe yithemba.

eng: working together, we overcame that crisis, and we have started to recover.
zul: ngokusebenza ngokubambisana sasinqoba leso simo esinzima, futhi sesiqalile ukusimama.

eng: today our economy is larger than it was before the pandemic.
zul: namuhla umnotho wethu usumkhulu kunalokho owabe uyikona ngaphambi kobhubhane.

eng: between the third quarters of 2021 and 2022, around one and a half million new jobs were created in our economy.
zul: phakathi kwekota yesithathu yowezi-2021 neyowezi-2022, abalelwa kwisigidi nesigamu amathuba amasha omsebenzi adalekile emnothweni wethu.

eng: the presidential employment stimulus has provided work and livelihood opportunities to more than one million people.
zul: uhlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi seluhlinzeke ngamathuba omsebenzi nezindlela zokuziphilisa kubantu abevile esigidini esisodwa.

eng: last year, our matriculants defied the effects of the pandemic to achieve a pass rate of 80% and we congratulate them for that great achievement.
zul: ngonyaka odlule abafundi bethu bakamatikuletsheni bayishaya ngembibizane imithelela yobhubhane ngokuthi bazuze izinga lokuphasa elingama-80% futhi siyabahalalisela ngaleyo mpumelelo yabo enkulukazi.

eng: we see this spirit of determination in our artists, musicians, actors, authors and sportsmen and women, who are making waves at home, on the continent and beyond our shores.
zul: lo moya wokuzimisela nokuphikelela siyawubona kumaciko ethu, abaculi, abalingisi, ababhali kanye nabadlali besilisa nabesifazane, abenza umsebenzi oncomekayo lapha ekhaya, ezwekazini kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

eng: banyana banyana made us proud when they won the women’s africa cup of nations to become the champions of africa.
zul: ibanyana banyana yasenza siziqhenye ngenkathi idla umhlanganiso emqhudelwaneni wendebe yabesifazane yase-afrika ukuze ibe ngoshampeni base-afrika.

eng: zakes bantwini, nomcebo zikode and wouter kellerman have made us proud at the grammy awards for their collaboration, bayethe.
zul: u-zakes bantwini, nonomcebo zikode kanye no-wouter kellerman basenze saziqhayisa emcimbini wezindondo ama-grammy award ngenoni lengoma abayivubele ngokuhlanganyela esihloko sithi bayethe.

eng: what we have achieved as a nation over the past year, despite our challenges, remind us that the promise of south africa is alive.
zul: lokho esikuzuzile njengesizwe kulo nyaka odlule, nakuba sinazo izinselele, kuyasikhumbuza ukuthi isithembiso seningizimu afrika siyaphila.

eng: the progress we have seen should give us courage as we look to a better future.
zul: inqubekela phambili esiyibonile kumele isinike isibindi ngenkathi sibheke phambili kwingomuso elingcono.

eng: and yet, i address you this evening, in homes across the country, many people are suffering, many are worried, many are uncertain and many are without hope.
zul: kepha-ke nakuba kunjalo, njengoba ngikhuluma nani kusihlwa nje, emakhaya ezweni lonkana, abantu badlala inhlupheko, abaningi bakhathazekile, abaningi abanakho ukuqiniseka futhi abaningi abanalo ithemba.

eng: but of this i am certain.
zul: kodwa-ke mina engiqinisekile ngakho yilokhu.

eng: whatever the difficulties of the moment, whatever crises we face, we will rise to meet them together and, together, we will overcome them.
zul: noma ngabe ngobunjani ubunzima obukhona kulo mzuzu, noma ngabe yisimo esinzima kangakanani esibhekene naso, thina sizosukuma sibhekane nalokhu ngokuhlanganyela, futhi ngokubambisana sizonqoba.

eng: this, we will be able to do if we work together and leave no one behind.
zul: lokhu sizokwazi ukukwenza uma sisebenzisana futhi engekho noyedwa umuntu esimshiya ngemuva.

eng: we gather here at a time of crisis.
zul: sibuthene lapha esikhathini lapho sibhekene nesimo esinzima.

eng: our country has, for many months, endured a debilitating electricity shortage that has caused immense damage to our economy.
zul: sekuphele eziningi izinyanga izwe lethu likhungethwe yinkinga enkulukazi yokushoda kukagesi esidale umonakalo omkhulu emnothweni wethu.

eng: and for two years before that, our society was devastated by the covid-19 pandemic that caused great loss of life and much hardship.
zul: futhi eminyakeni emibili ngaphambi kwalokho, umphakathi wethu wabe ukhahlanyezwe wubhubhane olwadala ukulahleka kwemiphefumulo eminingi kanye nobunzima obukhulu.

eng: the pandemic worsened a situation of deep unemployment, as the country lost two million jobs.
zul: ubhubhane lwasenza saba sibi kakhulu isimo sokuntuleka kakhulu kwamathuba omsebenzi, njengoba izwe lalahlekelwa yimisebenzi eyizigidi ezimbili.

eng: the pandemic negatively affected livelihoods and increased poverty.
zul: ubhubhane lwaba nomthelela omubi kakhulu kwizindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu futhi lwakhuphula nobubha.

eng: in july 2021, we experienced the worst public violence and destruction in the history of our democracy, causing over 300 deaths.
zul: ngontulikazi wezi-2021, sazithola sibhekene nodlame lomphakathi olubi nokucekelwa phansi kwempahla okubi kakhulu emlandweni wombuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu, okwabangela ukushona kwabantu abangaphezu kwama-300.

eng: last year, parts of the eastern cape, kwazulu-natal and north west were struck by catastrophic flooding that caused extensive loss of life, the destruction of homes and damage to infrastructure.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, izingxenye zempumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natali kanye nenyakatho ntshonalanga zahlaselwa yizikhukhula ezadala umonakalo omkhulu ezadlula nemiphefumulo yabantu abaningi, zacekela phansi izindlu futhi zalimaza nengqalasizinda.

eng: and now, persistent load-shedding is impeding our recovery from the effects of these events.
zul: futhi manje, ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga okulokhu kuqhubeke njalo kuphazamisa ukululama kwethu kwimithelela yalezi zigameko.

eng: we know that without a reliable supply of electricity, businesses cannot grow, assembly lines cannot run, crops cannot be irrigated and basic services are interrupted.
zul: siyazi ukuthi ngaphandle kokuphakelwa kukagesi okuthembakele, amabhizinisi ngeke akwazi ukukhula, izimboni ngeke zikwazi ukukhiqiza imikhiqizo yazo, izitshalo ngeke zichelelwe futhi ziyaphazamiseka nezinsiza eziyisisekelo.

eng: load-shedding means that households and supermarkets are unable to keep food fresh, water supply is often disrupted, traffic lights do not work and streets are not lit at night.
zul: ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kusho ukuthi amakhaya kanye namasuphamakethe ngeke akwazi ukugcina ukudla kusesimweni esikahle, ukuphakelwa kwamanzi kuvamise ukuphazamiseka, amarobhothi awasebenzi futhi nezibani azikhanyi emgwaqeni ebusuku.

eng: without a reliable supply of electricity, our efforts to grow an inclusive economy that creates jobs and reduces poverty will not succeed.
zul: ngaphandle kokuphakelwa kukagesi okuthembakele, izobhuntsha imizamo yethu yokukhulisa umnotho obandakanyayo odala amathuba omsebenzi futhi onciphisa ububha.

eng: therefore, as we outline our agenda for the year ahead, our most immediate task is to dramatically reduce the severity of load-shedding in the coming months and ultimately end load-shedding altogether.
zul: ngakho-ke, njengoba sichazela izwe kafushane ngohlelokusebenza lwethu lwalo nyaka esiwuphethe, umsebenzi okumele siwenze ngokushesha okukhulu wukuthi kulezi zinyanga ezizayo sikunciphise kakhulu ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga futhi ekugcineni sikuqede nya ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

eng: under these conditions, we cannot proceed as we usually would.
zul: ngaphansi kwalezi zimo, asikwazi ukuqhubeka njengenjwayelo.

eng: the people of south africa want action, they want solutions and they want government to work for them.
zul: abantu baseningizimu afrika bafuna sibhukule sithathe izinyathelo, bafuna izixazululo futhi bafuna ubasebenzele uhulumeni.

eng: they simply want to know when a problem like load-shedding will be brought to an end.
zul: into abafuna ukuyazi nje wukuthi izoqedwa nini inkinga enjengokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

eng: we are, therefore, focused on those actions that will make a meaningful difference now, that will enable real progress within the next year and that will lay a foundation for a sustained recovery into the future.
zul: ngakho-ke, sigxile kulezi zinyathelo ezizokwenza umehluko ononhlonze khona manje, ezizovumela inqubekela phambili yoqobo kuwona lo nyaka esingena kuwona futhi ezizokwakha isisekelo sokusimama okuqhubekayo okuphokophele kwingomuso.

eng: we are not presenting new plans, nor are we outlining here the full programme of government.
zul: asethuli izinhlelo ezintsha, futhi lapha asethuli uhlelo oluphelele lukahulumeni.

eng: rather we are concentrating on those issues that concern south africans the most: load-shedding.
zul: esikhundleni salokho sigxile kulezo zinkinga okuyizona ezibakhathaza kakhulu abantu baseningizimu afrika: ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

eng: unemployment.
zul: ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.

eng: poverty and the rising cost of living.
zul: ububha kanye nezindleko zokuphila ezidlondlobalayo.

eng: crime and corruption.
zul: ubugebengu nenkohlakalo.

eng: there are no easy solutions to any of these challenges.
zul: azikho izixazululo ezilula kunoma yiziphi zalezi zinselele.

eng: yet we have the strength, the means and the wherewithal to overcome them.
zul: kepha-ke nakuba kunjalo sinawo amandla, izindlela kanye nezinsiza zokuzixazulula.

eng: if we work together and act boldly and decisively, leaving no one behind, we will be able to resolve our challenges.
zul: uma sisebenza ngokubambisana futhi sithatha izinyathelo ngaphandle kovalo nokunanaza, singashiyi noyedwa umuntu ngemuva, sizokwazi ukuxazulula izinselele zethu.

eng: this state of the nation address (sona) is about seeing hope where there is despair.
zul: le nkulumo echaza isimo sezwe (i-sona) iphathelene nokubona ithemba esimweni lapho kubonakala khona ukuphelelwa yithemba.

eng: it is about showing a way out of these crises.
zul: iphathelene nokukhombisa indlela yokuphunyula nokuphulukundlela kulezi zimo ezinzima.

eng: this evening, we will give an account of our progress in implementing the commitments we made in last year’s sona.
zul: kusihlwa nje, sizochaza ngenqubekela phambili esesiyenzile ekuqaliseni ukusebenza kwezibophezelo esazenza ku-sona yonyaka odlule.

eng: over the course of the last year, we have laid a firm foundation based on the commitments we made for faster growth through our investment drive, economic reforms, public employment programmes and an expanding infrastructure programme.
zul: ngokuqhubeka konyaka odlule, sabeka isisekelo esiqinile esisuselwa kwizibophezelo esazenza zokuletha ukukhula okusheshayo ngokusebenzisa umshikashika wethu wokuheha utshalomali, izinguquko kwezomnotho, izinhlelo zokuqashwa komphakathi kanye nohlelo lokwandiswa kwengqalasizinda.

eng: what is clear from our experience of the last few years – indeed from our history as a democracy – is that we are not a people easily resigned to our fate.
zul: okucace bha ezimweni esihlangabezane nazo kule minyaka embadlwana edlule – ngokunjalo futhi nasemlandweni wethu njengezwe elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu – wukuthi thina asibona neze abantu abaphonsa ithawula kalula nje, bamukele noma yini eyenzeka kubona.

eng: when we faced the greatest challenge of apartheid, we did not submit to the oppression that the apartheid regime imposed on our people.
zul: ngenkathi sibhekene nenselele enkulukazi yobandlululo asizange siphonse ithawula, samukele ingcindezelo yombuso wobandlululo phezu kwabantu bakithi.

eng: we stood firm and engaged in a struggle, hopeful that our cause would triumph.
zul: sabhekana nayo ngqo, sazabalaza, ngethemba lokuthi sizonqoba.

eng: against all odds we were able to defeat the apartheid system.
zul: nakuba lokhu kwakuwumqansa saphumelela ukunqoba inqubo yobandlululo.

eng: we can, and we will change the circumstances in which we find ourselves today.
zul: singaziguqula izimo esizithola sikuzona namuhla, futhi sizoziguqula.

eng: we are both able and determined to overcome these difficulties and place our economy on a firm path to recovery.
zul: sinawo amandla ngokunjalo futhi nokuzimisela ukunqoba lobu bunzima futhi sibeke umnotho wethu endleleni eqinile ebheke ekululameni nokusimama.

eng: our most immediate priority is to restore energy security.
zul: into esemqoka kakhulu eseqhulwini okumele sibhekane nayo ngokushesha wukuqinisekisa ukuthi kubuyela esimweni esijwayelekile ukuphakelwa kukagesi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi ugesi utholakala ngaso sonke isikhathi.
