eng: in december, government introduced a temporary ban on the export of scrap copper cable and certain metals to disrupt criminal syndicates and enable a new trading system to be put in place.
zul: ngozibandlela, uhulumeni wethule ukumiswa okwesikhashana kokuthunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kwamakhebuli ethusi asesetshenzisiwe kanye nezinsimbi ezithile ezingamasekeni ukuze kunqandwe amaqembu ezigelekeqe futhi kuvunyelwe ukuqaliswa kohlelo olusha lokuhweba.

eng: just as we have embarked on economic reforms in electricity, water, telecommunication and logistics through operation vulindlela, we are embarking on a process of reform to improve the effectiveness of our fight against crime.
zul: njengoba sesiqalise izinguquko zomnotho kwezikagesi, amanzi, ukuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe kanye nokuthuthwa kwempahla ngokusebenzisa umkhankaso i-operation vulindlela, ngakolunye uhlangothi siqalisa inqubo yezinguquko yokuphucula impumelelo yempi yethu yokulwisana nobugebengu.

eng: we will use our competitiveness in call centre operations to support the proper functioning of the 10111 help line, partnering with the private sector.
zul: sizosebenzisa ikhono lethu lokwenza ngobunyoninco futhi ngendlela engambi eqolo umsebenzi wezizinda ezamukela izingcingo ukuze sisekele ukusebenza ngendlela efanele kwenombono yosizo i-10111, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

eng: this is to ensure that when people call the police, their calls are answered and their emergencies are attended to.
zul: lokhu kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uma abantu befonela amaphoyisa, ziyaphendulwa izingcingo zabo futhi izimo eziphuthumayo ababhekene nazo zithathelwa izinyathelo.

eng: we will also use data driven methods in a more sophisticated way to identify and target crime hotspots.
zul: futhi sizosebenzisa ngobuhlakani obukhulu izindlela ezisekelwe kakhulu kwimininingo yolwazi olutholakele ukuhlonza kanye nokugxila ngokuqondileyo ezidlekeni zobugebengu.

eng: significantly, more funding will be made available in this budget for the police, the npa and the special investigating unit.
zul: okusemqoka kakhulu, amaphoyisa, i-npa kanye nophiko oluphenya amacala akhethekile kuzokwabelwa imali engeziwe kulesi sabelomali.

eng: crimes against women and children remain a deeply disturbing feature of our national life.
zul: amacala abhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane asalokhu eyinto ekhathazayo kakhulu empilweni yesizwe sethu.

eng: in november last year, we held the second presidential summit on gbvf to assess progress in the implementation of the national strategic plan, which adopted as a comprehensive, effective and united response to this pandemic.
zul: ngolwezi ngonyaka odlule, sabamba ingqungquthela kamongameli yesibili ye-gbvf ngenhloso yokuhlola inqubekela phambili esiyenziwe ekuqaliseni uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke, eyamukela ngokusemthethweni uhlelo olubanzi, olusebenza kahle futhi olunokubumbana lokulwisana nalolu bhubhane.

eng: one of the great successes of our effort to fight gbv is the extent to which social partners have rallied around the national strategic plan.
zul: enye yezimpumelelo ezinkulukazi zomzamo wethu wokulwisana ne-gbv yindlela abalwamukele futhi balweseka ngayo uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini.

eng: in january last year, i signed into law three key pieces of legislation that afford greater protection to survivors of gbv and ensure that perpetrators are no longer able to use legislative loopholes to evade prosecution.
zul: ngomasingana ngonyaka odlule, ngasayina imithethosivivinywa emithathu esemqoka ukuze ibe yimithetho ezonikeza ukuvikeleka okuthe xaxa kulabo abasinde ku-gbv futhi eqinisekisayo ukuthi abenzi bobubi ngeke besakwazi ukusebenzisa amaqhinga athile awumphumela wobuthakathaka bomthetho ukuze bagweme ukushushiswa.

eng: we continue to improve the accessibility and functioning of sexual offences courts and expand the network of thuthuzela care centres.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwenza ngcono ukufinyeleleka kanye nokusebenza kwezinkantolo zamacala ezocansi kanye nokwandisa izikhungo zokunakekela, phecelezi, ama-thuthuzela care centres.

eng: a key aspect of the national strategic plan is the economic empowerment of women.
zul: into esemqoka kakhulu ohlelweni lweqhingasu likazwelonke wukufukulwa nokuhlonyiswa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho.

eng: since announcing our determination to direct at least 40% of public procurement to women-owned businesses, we have sought to establish an enabling environment to support women entrepreneurs.
zul: kusukela ngamemezela ukuzimisela kwethu ukuthi okungenani ama-40% empahla nezinsizakalo ezithengwa nguhulumeni kumele kuthengwe emabhizinisini abesifazane, sihlose ukwenza isimo esikahle esizovumela ukwesekwa kosomabhizinisi besifazane.

eng: we have trained more than 3 400 women-owned enterprises to prepare them to take up procurement opportunities.
zul: sesiqeqeshe amabhizinisi abesifazane angaphezu kwezi-3 400, ukuze siwalungiselele ukusebenzisa amathuba okuhlinzeka ngempahla nezinsizakalo kuhulumeni.

eng: through the women’s economic assembly, we have seen industry associations and companies committing to industry-wide gender transformation targets.
zul: ngokusebenzisa ingqungquthela yabesifazane yezomnotho, sesibone izinhlangano nezinkampani zemboni zizibophezela ekufinyeleleni emigomweni ebekiwe yoguquko oluphathelene nezobulili embonini yonkana.

eng: the industrial development corporation has earmarked approximately r9 billion to invest in women-led businesses.
zul: inhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni seyibeke eceleni imali elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi eziyisi-9 zamarandi ezotshalwa emabhizinisini aholwa ngabesifazane.

eng: other entities, including the public investment corporation and the national empowerment fund, have also committed to establish special purpose vehicles to support women-owned businesses.
zul: ezinye izikhungo, kubandakanya inhlangano yezokutshalwa kwezimali zikahulumeni kanye nesikhwama sikazwelonke sokufukula nokuhlomisa abantu abamnyama, nazo sezizibophezelelile ukuthi zizosungula izinhlelo ezikhethekile ezenzelwe kuphela umsebenzi wokweseka amabhizinisi abesifazane.

eng: we must all play our part, as individuals, institutions and leaders across society, to end these crimes against women and children.
zul: sonke kumele sidlale indima yethu, njengomuntu ngamunye, njengezikhungo futhi njengabaholi emphakathini wonkana ukuze siqede lobu bugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.

eng: last year, i said that we would take decisive action against corruption and make a clear break with the era of state capture.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngathi sizothatha izinyathelo ezinqala zokulwisana nenkohlakalo futhi ukuze siphume siphele esikhathini sokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

eng: the state capture commission headed by chief justice raymond zondo completed its work and submitted the final part of its report in june last year.
zul: ikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane ephethwe yinhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo isiwuphothulile umsebenzi wayo futhi iyithumelile ingxenye yokugcina yombiko wayo ngonhlangulana wonyaka odlule.

eng: as a country, we owe chief justice zondo, the commission staff and all those who provided testimony a huge debt of gratitude for their extraordinary public service.
zul: njengezwe, kumele sibonge sinconcoze kwinhloko yamajaji uzondo, abasebenzi bekhomishani kanye nabo bonke labo abethula ubufakazi ngomsebenzi omkhulukazi abawenzela isizwe.

eng: the recommendations of the commission are being implemented according to the plan that i submitted to parliament in october last year so that the systemic weaknesses identified by the commission are addressed and state capture is never allowed to occur again.
zul: izincomo zekhomishani ziyaqaliswa ngokohlelo engaluthumela ephalamende ngomfumfu ngonyaka odlule ukuze ukuntengantenga nobuthakathaka obukhona obahlonzwa yikhomishani kubhekwane ngqo nako futhi ukuze singalokothi neze sikuvumele ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.

eng: the national anti-corruption advisory council, consisting of people from across society, is in place to advise on suitable mechanisms to stem corruption, including an overhaul the institutional architecture for combatting corruption.
zul: umkhandlu kazwelonke wokweluleka mayelana nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, owakhiwe ngabantu abavela emphakathini wonkana, sewusunguliwe ukuze weluleke maqondana nezindlela zokuqeda inkohlakalo, kubandakanya nokulungiswa kabusha ngokuphelele kwesimo sohlaka lokwakheka nokusebenza kwezikhungo ukuze kulwiswane nenkohlakalo.

eng: we are working to capacitate the witness protection unit and will introduce amendments to the protected disclosures act, 2000 (act 26 of 2000) and witness protection act, 1998 (act 112 of 1998) to strengthen protections for whistle-blowers.
zul: siyasebenza ngenhloso yokuhlomisa ngezinsiza nokucija uphiko lokuvikelwa kofakazi futhi sizokwethula izichibiyelo emthethweni wokudalula ulwazi ngendlela evikelekile, wezi-2000 (umthetho wama-26 wezi-2000) kanye nomthetho wokuvikelwa kofakazi, we-1998 (umthetho we-112 we-1998) ukuze siqinise ukuvikelwa kwezingede.

eng: work is already underway to improve access to the witness protection programme for public servants that expose maladministration, corruption and unethical conduct.
zul: usuqalile umsebenzi wokwenza ngcono ukufinyelela ohlelweni lokuvikelwa kofakazi kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni abaveza obala izenzo zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, inkohlakalo kanye nokuziphatha okungenaso isimilo nobuqotho.

eng: we will finalise the draft public procurement bill to address weaknesses identified by the state capture commission and improve efficiency, value for money and transparency.
zul: sizophothula uhlaka lomthethosivivinywa wokuthengwa kwempahla nezinsizakalo ezidingwa nguhulumeni ukuze silungise ubuthakathaka nokungahanjiswa kwezinto ngendlela okwahlonzwa yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi senze ngcono ukusebenza, uhulumeni athole imbuyiselomali enhle ngemali ayisebenzisile futhi kusetshenzwe ngendlela evulelekile nesobala.

eng: our reinvigorated law enforcement agencies are taking firm action against companies and individuals alleged to have been involved in state capture.
zul: izimpiko zethu zokugcina umthetho esezinogqozi nofuqufuqu olusha zithatha izinyathelo ezinqala ezinkampanini nakubantu abasolwa ngokubandakanyeka ekubanjweni kombuso ngobhongwane.

eng: the npa investigating directorate, which i established in 2019, has taken 187 accused persons to court in 32 state capture and corruption cases.
zul: uphiko lwezokuphenya amacala lwe-npa, engalusungula ngowezi-2019, selubizele enkantolo abasolwa abayi-187 emacaleni angama-32 okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye nenkohlakalo.

eng: over r7 billion has so far been returned to the state from state capture cases.
zul: kuze kube manje iyizigidigidi eziyisi-7 zamarandi imali esibuyiselwe kumbuso evela emacaleni okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

eng: to date, r12.9 billion of funds and assets have been frozen.
zul: kuze kube manje, iyizigidigidi eziyi-12.9 zamarandi imali nempahla ebanjiwe.

eng: this year, the investigating directorate will be established as a permanent entity within the npa.
zul: kulo nyaka, uphiko lwezokuphenya amacala selusungulwe njengesikhungo esizosebenza unomphela ngaphakathi kwe-npa.

eng: fellow south africans, to achieve any progress in addressing the urgent challenges we face, we need a capable and effective state.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, ukuze kwenziwe noma iyiphi inqubekela phambili ekusombululeni izinselele eziphuthumayo esibhekene nazo, sidinga umbuso onamandla futhi onekhono lokusebenza kahle.

eng: our greatest weaknesses are in state-owned enterprises and local government.
zul: ubuthakathaka bethu obukhulu busemabhizinisini ombuso nakohulumeni basekhaya.

eng: many of our soes are struggling with significant debt, under-investment in infrastructure, the effects of state capture and a shortage of skills.
zul: iningi lama-soe ethu licwile ezikweletini ezinzima, utshalomali alufakwa kahle kwingqalasizinda, futhi libhekene nemithelela yokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye kunokushoda kwamakhono.

eng: we will implement the recommendation of the presidential soe council to establish a state-owned holding company as part of a centralised shareholder model that will ensure effective oversight of soes.
zul: sizokuqalisa ukusebenza kwesincomo somkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe sokusungula inkampani ezoba ngumnikazi wamabhizinisi ombuso njengengxenye yohlelo lokubeka amandla obunikazi bomnikazimasheya ezandleni zesikhungo esisodwa oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wokuqapha ama-soe wenziwa ngendlela efanele.

eng: separately, i have instructed the presidency and national treasury to work together to rationalise government departments, entities and programmes over the next three years.
zul: okunye okuseceleni okwehlukile wukuthi sengiyalele ihhovisi likamongameli kanye nomgcinimafa kazwelonke ukuthi basebenzisane ekuhlelweni kabusha kweminyango, izikhungo kanye nezinhlelo zikahulumeni kule minyaka emithathu ezayo.

eng: national treasury estimates that we could achieve a potential saving of r27 billion in the medium term if we deal with overlapping mandates, close ineffective programmes and consolidate entities where appropriate.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke ulinganisela ekutheni kungenzeka kongiwe imali eyizigidigidi ezingama-27 zamarandi esikhathini esimaphakathi uma kulungiswa inkinga yamagunya afanayo enziwa ngokungenasidingo yiminyango nezikhungo ezahlukene, kuvalwe nezinhlelo ezingasebenzi kahle futhi kuhlanganiswe izikhungo ezahlukene zibe yisikhungo esisodwa lapho kufanelekile.

eng: the poor performance of many local governments remains an area of concern.
zul: ukungaqhubi kahle kohulumeni basekhaya abaningi kusalokhu kuyinto edala ukukhathazeka.

eng: too many of our municipalities, 163 out of 257, are dysfunctional or in distress due to poor governance, ineffective and sometimes corrupt financial and administrative management and poor service delivery.
zul: omasipala bethu abaningi kakhulu, abayi-163 komasipala abangama-257, abasebenzi neze kahle noma basobishini ngenhla yokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokungasebenzi kahle futhi kwesinye sikhathi ngenxa yenkohlakalo ekuphathweni kwezimali nokulawulwa kwemisebenzi yomasipala kanye nokungathunyelwa kwezidingongqangi ngendlela efanele.

eng: government is implementing a number of interventions to address failures at local government level and improve basic service delivery.
zul: uhulumeni uqalisa izinhlelo zokungenelela eziningana ngenhloso yokulungisa ukuhluleka okukhona ezingeni lohulumeni basekhaya futhi kwenziwe ngcono nokuhlinzekwa kwezidingongqangi.

eng: these include enhancing the capacity of public representatives and officials, maintaining and upgrading local infrastructure, and invoking the powers of national government to intervene where municipalities fail to meet their responsibilities.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukuphuculwa kwamandla namakhono okusebenza abameleli bomphakathi kanye nabasebenzi, ukulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda yendawo, kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamandla kahulumeni kazwelonke okungenelela lapho omasipala behluleka ukufezekisa izibopho zabo.

eng: a professional public service, staffed by skilled, committed and ethical people, is critical to an effective state and ending corruption, patronage and wastage.
zul: umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni osebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco, onabasebenzi abanamakhono, abazinikele futhi abanobuqotho, usemqoka kakhulu embusweni osebenza kahle kanye nasekuqedeni inkohlakalo, ukuqasha ngokwenzelela ngokusebenzisa amandla ngokungafanele kanye nokumosha.

eng: in response to the state capture commission and in line with the framework for the professionalisation of the public service, integrity assessments will become a mandatory requirement for recruitment to the public service and entry exams will be introduced.
zul: ngenhloso yokusabela nokufezekisa lokho okushiwo yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi ngokuhambisana nohlaka lokwenziwa komkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni usebenze ngobuchule nobunyoninco, ukuhlolwa kwesimilo nobuqotho kuzoba yisidingo esiphoqelekile uma kuqashwa abasebenzi emkhakheni wezemisebenzi kahulumeni futhi kuzokwethulwa ukuhlolwa kwalabo abagaqele ukungena futhi basebenze kulo mkhakha.

eng: we are amending legislation and strengthening the role of the public service commission to ensure that qualified people are appointed to senior management positions and to move towards creating a single, harmonised public service.
zul: sichibiyela imithetho futhi siqinisa indima yekhomishani yezemisebenzi kahulumeni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ngabantu abanezicucu zemfundo nolwazi lomsebenzi olufanelekile abaqashwa ezikhundleni zokuphatha eziphezulu futhi ukuze sikwazi ukuqalisa umsebenzi wokwakha umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni owodwa futhi osebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo.

eng: honourable members, just as we are committed to improving the fortunes of our countrymen and women and to advancing shared prosperity for all, so too is our commitment to achieving a better africa and a better world.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, njengoba sizibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono isimo senhlalo nempumelelo yabesilisa nabesifazane bakuleli kanye nasekuthuthukiseni ukuchuma komuntu wonke, ngokunjalo futhi sizibophezele nasekufezekiseni i-afrika engcono kanye nomhlaba ongcono.

eng: we are greatly concerned at the recent escalation of tensions between israelis and palestinians, and call for an end to hostilities and for a resumption of the stalled peace process.
zul: sikhathazeke kakhulu ngokudlondlobala kamuva nje kwengxabano phakathi kwabantu bakwa-israel kanye nabantu base-palestine, futhi siyanxusa ukuthi kuphele ukungqubuzana futhi kuqaliswe kabusha inqubo emileyo njengamanje yokuletha uxolo.

eng: south africa expresses its deepest condolences to the government and people of türkiye following the devastating earthquake earlier this week.
zul: iningizimu afrika izwakalisa ukuzwelana kwayo okukhulu nohulumeni kanye nabantu base-türkiye kulandela ukuzamazama komhlaba okudale umonakalo omkhulu ngasekuqaleni kwaleli viki.

eng: as a country we are immensely proud of the efforts of gift of the givers to help those affected by the earthquake.
zul: njengezwe siziqhenya kakhulu ngemizamo yenhlangano i-gift of the givers yokusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe wukuzamazama komhlaba.

eng: we remain deeply concerned about the ongoing russia-ukraine conflict and urge all parties to cease hostilities and seek a peaceful solution through dialogue.
zul: sisalokhu sikhathazeke kakhulu ngempi eqhubekayo phakathi kwe-russia ne-ukraine futhi siyabanxusa bonke abathintekayo ukuba babeke phansi izikhali futhi bazame ukuthola isixazululo esinokuthula ngokuthi kuxoxiswane.

eng: south africa’s fortunes are inextricably linked to those of our continent, and to the southern african development community in particular.
zul: impumelelo yeningizimu afrika incike kakhulu kuleyo yezwekazi lethu, ikakhulukazi isifunda samazwe angaphansi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika.

eng: for the sake of our own stability and prosperity, we are duty bound to pursue interventions that will bring peace, stability and development in our continent.
zul: ngenxa yokucabangela uzinzo nokuchuma kwakuleli, sinesibopho sokwenza imizamo yokungenelela ezoletha ukuthula, uzinzo kanye nentuthuko ezwekazini lethu.

eng: we will continue to expand trade and investment opportunities with our global trade partners and will look to attract investment and financing to south africa through our participation in multilateral forums such as the g20, which we will host in 2025. this year south africa assumes the chairship of the brazil, russia, india, china and south africa group of countries.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokwandisa amathuba okuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali namazwe esibambisene nawo kwezohwebo emhlabeni futhi sizozama ukuheha utshalomali kanye nokuxhaswa ngezimali kweningizimu afrika ngokusebenzisa ukubamba iqhaza kwethu kwizigcawu ezibandakanya amazwe ahlukahlukene ezinjenge-g20, okuyisigcawu esizosisingatha ngowezi-2025.

eng: our focus will be on collaboration on sustainable development, the just energy transition, industrialisation and the implementation of the african continental free trade area.
zul: kulo nyaka iningizimu afrika izophinda futhi iqhoqhobale isikhundla sokuba ngusihlalo wombimbi lwamazwe lwe-brazil, i-russia, i-india, i-china kanye neningizimu afrika.

eng: south africa, together with our neighbours in the southern african customs union, will soon finalise our industrial offer on the african continental free trade area.
zul: sizogxila kubambiswano maqondana nentuthuko esimeme, ukuguqukela emandleni kagesi ohlanzekile ngendlela enobulungiswa nobuqotho, ukusungulwa kwezimboni kanye nokuqaliswa kwendawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

eng: once fully operationalised, the continental free trade will provide an unprecedented opportunity to deepen african economic integration, grow national economies, and open up new frontiers and markets for south african companies.
zul: iningizimu afrika, ngokuhlanganyela nomakhelwane bayo kwinhlangano yamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika angakhokhisani intela yezimpahla ezingenayo neziphumayo emingceleni, phecelezi, i-southern african customs union, khona maduze nje izophothula isiphakamiso sethu esiphathelene nezimboni kwindawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

eng: fellow south africans, a nation’s true character is revealed in times of crisis.
zul: uma seyisebenza ngokuphelele, indawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini izohlinzeka ngethuba eliyingqayizivele lokuqinisa ukudidiyelwa kwe-afrika kwezomnotho, ukukhuliswa kweminotho yamazwe, kanye nokuvulelwa kwezinkampani zaseningizimu afrika imingcele emisha kanye nezimakethe.

eng: a nation is defined by how its people meet the gravest of difficulties – whether they work together and confront their challenges as one, united by a common purpose, or whether they surrender to the problems before them.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, isimobunjalo soqobo sesizwe sivela obala lapho kubhekenwe nesimo esinzima.

eng: we are a nation seized with the challenges of the present, but we are also a nation striving to fulfil the promise of our future.
zul: isizwe sizibonakalisa ubunjalo baso ngendlela abantu baso ababhekana ngayo nobunzima obukhulu – sizibonakalisa ngokuthi siyakwazi yini ukusebenzisana ngokuhlanganyela futhi sibhekane ngqo nezinselele zaso njengesizwe esisodwa, esibunjaniswe yinhloso efanayo, noma-ke siyisizwe esithi maluju, siphonse ithawula ezinkingeni esibhekene nazo.

eng: when we took our first steps on the road to democracy, we had a clear vision of where that road would lead us.
zul: ngenkathi sithatha isinyathelo sokuqala emgwaqeni obheke kwintando yeningi labantu, sabe sinombono ocacile wokuthi uyosiholela kuphi lowo mgwaqo.

eng: we saw a country in which all people were equal.
zul: sabona izwe lapho abantu bonke belingana.

eng: we saw a country in which the wealth of our resources would be enjoyed by all.
zul: sabona izwe lapho ingcebo yezinsiza zethu ithokozelwa ngumuntu wonke.

eng: we saw a country in which we could live together in peace, in which we could work together to build a common identity and a shared future.
zul: sabona izwe lapho singaphila ndawonye ngokuthula, lapho singasebenza ngokubambisana ukwakha ubuzwe bethu obufanayo kanye nengomuso lethu sonke.

eng: our nation is founded on a constitution which affirms the democratic values of dignity, equality and freedom, and the rights of each and every one of us.
zul: isizwe sethu sakhelwe phezu komthethosisekelo oqinisekisa amagugu entando yeningi labantu, okuyisithunzi, ukulingana kanye nenkululeko, kanye namalungelo omunye nomunye wethu sonke.

eng: the actions we have outlined this evening, building on the work we have already done, will bring us closer to that vision.
zul: izinyathelo engikhulume ngazo kafushane kusihlwa nje, ezakhela phezu komsebenzi esesiwenzile kakade, zizosisondeza kulowo mbono.

eng: they will enable us, working together and with purpose, to emerge from this crisis as a nation transformed.
zul: zizokwenza ukuthi, sisebenze ngokuhlanganyela futhi sisebenze ngenhloso, ukuze siphume kulesi simo esinzima siyisizwe esiguqukile.

eng: we will emerge from this crisis with an electricity system that is more efficient, more reliable and more competitive.
zul: sizophuma kulesi simo esinzima siphethe uhlelo lukagesi olusebenza kahle kakhulu, oluthembakele kakhudlwana futhi oluncintisana kangcono.

eng: we will emerge with ports and railways that again rival the best in the world, with broadband access for more south africans in more parts of the country, and with a sustainable supply of quality water.
zul: sizophuma siphethe izikhumulo kanye nezokuthutha ngezitimela ezizophinda futhi zibe sesimweni sokuncintisana nalezo eziphuma phambili emhlabeni, sizophuma siphethe uhlelo lwe-inthanethi olusheshayo okufinyelela kulona abantu baseningizimu afrika abaningi futhi olutholakala ezingxenyeni eziningi zezwe, futhi sizophuma siphethe ukuphakelwa kwamanzi aseqophelweni eliphezulu, atholakala ngaso sonke isikhathi.

eng: we will welcome more tourists to our country, and develop and attract the skills our economy needs.
zul: sizokwamukela izivakashi ezithe xaxa ezweni lethu, futhi sithuthukise siphinde sihehe amakhono adingwa ngumnotho wethu.

eng: we will create work for those who are unemployed, and give hope to those who have waited too long.
zul: sizokwakha amathuba omsebenzi kulabo abangasebenzi, futhi sinikeze ithemba kulabo osekuphele isikhathi eside kakhulu belindile.

eng: with more police on the street, with functioning community policing forums and an effective and independent prosecution authority, our people will be able to count on the protection of the state.
zul: ngokuthumela amaphoyisa angeziwe emigwaqeni, ngokuba nezinhlangano zomphakathi ezibambisene namaphoyisa ezisebenza kahle kanye nophiko lwezokushushisa olusebenza kahle futhi oluzimele, abantu bakithi bazokwazi ukuthembela ekuvikelweni ngumbuso.

eng: by fighting economic sabotage and organised crime, our infrastructure will be more secure and businesses will be able to operate more freely.
zul: ngokulwisana nokucekelwa phansi komnotho ngamabomu kanye nobugebengu obuhleliwe, ingqalasizinda yethu izovikeleka kakhudlwana futhi amabhizinisi azokwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi wawo ngokukhululeka okukhulu.

eng: through a strengthened and expanded social protection system, fewer people will live in poverty and fewer households will experience hunger.
zul: ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lwezibonelelo zikahulumeni oluqinisiwe futhi olweluliwe, bayingcosana kakhulu abantu abazophila esimweni sobuphofu futhi ayingcosana kakhulu amakhaya azobhuqabhuqwa yindlala.

eng: we must do all of these things, not only to overcome our immediate challenges, but to renew the promise of south africa.
zul: kumele sizenze zonke lezi zinto, hhayi nje kuphela ngenhloso yokunqoba izinselele esibhekene nazo njengamanje, kodwa ngenhloso yokuvuselela isithembiso seningizimu afrika.

eng: it is a promise that we have kept alive in our hearts and in our actions.
zul: yisithembiso esisigcine siphila ngaphakathi ezinhliziyweni futhi esisigcine siphila ngezenzo zethu.

eng: this year, it will be 10 years since we bid farewell to nelson mandela, the first president of a democratic south africa, our beloved madiba.
zul: kulo nyaka, kuzoba ngunyaka we-10 sashiywa emhlabeni ngu-nelson mandela, umongameli wokuqala weningizimu afrika ebuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, umadiba esimthanda kakhulu.

eng: it will also be 105 years since his birth.
zul: futhi kuzoba yiminyaka eyi-105 kusukela afika emhlabeni.

eng: as we honour his great life, let us draw inspiration from the words he spoke at his inauguration in 1994, when he said: “out of the experience of an extraordinary human disaster that lasted too long, must be born a society of which all humanity will be proud.
zul: njengoba sihlonipha leli qhawe, masithole ugqozi emazwini awasho emcimbini wokugcotshwa kwakhe ngowe-1994, lapho athi: “ekuhlangabezananeni nenhlekelele yesintu engajwayelekile neze eqhubeke isikhathi eside ngokwedlulele, kumele kuzalwe umphakathi abazoziqhenya ngawo bonke abantu.

eng: “our daily deeds as ordinary south africans must produce an actual south african reality that will reinforce humanity's belief in justice, strengthen its confidence in the nobility of the human soul and sustain all our hopes for a glorious life for all.” to build such a society, to overcome the great difficulties of the moment, we need to work together.
zul: “izenzo zethu zansuku zonke njengabantu phaqa baseningizimu afrika kumele zikhiqize isimo soqobo seningizimu afrika njengoba sinjalo esizoqinisa kabusha inkolelo yabantu kubulungiswa, siqinise ithemba labo kubuqotho bomoya womuntu futhi sisimamise amathemba ethu sonke empilo emnandi kumuntu wonke.” ukuze sakhe umphakathi onjalo, futhi ukuze sinqobe ubunzima obukhulukazi esibhekene nabo njengamanje, kumele sisebenze ngokubambisana.
